column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice] - [Pierce] {/} {/}} {nl} Memberikan damage ke target dengan mengeluarkan gelombang es dan memungkinan musuh terkena status frozen.

column2: Create a barrier of ice with a chance to freeze enemies.
column3: 얼음 장벽을 만들어 대상을 일정 확률로 결빙 상태에 걸리게 합니다.
column4: Membuat tembok dari Es, dapat menyebabkan musuh terkena status frozen.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl} Inflicts damage by shattering a frozen target.

column4: {#993399} {ol} [Magic] - [Ice] {/} {/} {nl} Memberikan damage dengan meledakkan target yang terkena status frozen.

column2: Create a wall of ice to temporarily defend yourself against attacks from enemies.
column3: 잠시동안 얼음벽을 만들어 적의 공격을 방어합니다.
column4: Membuat Ice Wall sementara yang dapat melindungimu dari serangan musuh.

column2: Creates a gust of wind that pushes the target away. Inflicts damage on targets that are frozen or nearby an Ice Wall.
column3: 강풍을 일으켜 대상을 밀쳐냅니다. 결빙 상태거나 아이스월 근처의 대상에게는 피해를 줍니다.
column4: Membuat hembusan angin yang dapat membuat musuh terpental. Musuh akan terkena damage jika dalam status frozen atau didekat Ice Wall.

column2: Summons a tree of ice on the ground that pulls nearby enemies in and has a chance of freezing them.
column3: 지면에 얼음 나무를 소환하여 주변의 대상을 끌어당깁니다.
column4: Summon pohon yang terbuat dari Es, untuk menarik target terdekat.

column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] {/} {/} {nl} Memberikan damage terus menerus pada target didepanmu.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Captures targets in front of you using psychokinesis.{nl}Inflicts damage by throwing the captured target to a direction using your arrow keys.

column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] {/} {/} {nl} Menangkap target yang ada didepanmu dengan psychokinesis. {nl} Dapat memberikan damage dengan melempar target menggunakan tombol arah.

column4: Memerintahkan Companion kamu untuk menemukan musuh yang bersembunyi.

column2: Hide yourself in an apple barrel to avoid the attention of enemies. The barrel provides defense against several attacks.

column4: Bersembunyilah di dalam Apple Barrel untuk menghindari musuh. Barrel akan melindungimu dari beberapa serangan.

column2: Shoot a noisemaker arrow at the enemy. Also affect enemies nearby.

column4: [Stop] bsia digunakan pada boss monster, tetapi saat stop selesai, boss tidak bisa di berikan stop kembali.

column2: Enemies provoked after using [Backmasking] will fall under [Panic] for 2 seconds per attribute level.

column4: Musuh yang terprovokasi setelah menggunakan [Back Masking] akan terkena [Panic] selama 2 detik per attribute level.

column2: Critical probability of skill [multi-shot] is increased by 1% per Attribute level.

column4: Critical chance skill [multi-shot] meningkat 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the knockback power of [Full Draw] by 50.
Decreases the charging speed of [Full Draw] by 0.5 seconds per level.
column4: Charge speed [Fulldraw] skill berkurang 0.5 detik per level.

column2: Critical chance increases by 2% per attribute level while in [Kneeling Shot].

column2: Decreases the interval of [Cure]'s magic circle by 0.2 seconds.
column4: Periode skill [Cure] magic square berkurang 0.2 detik.

column2: Increases Holy attacks by 1 for 5 seconds per level the when allies step on a tile of [Heal].

column4: Meningkatkan Holy attacks sebesar 1 untuk 5 detik per level ketika teman melangkah ke kotak [Heal].

column2: Receive [Heal] at 2% chance per attribute level when using [Heal].

column4: Menerima [Heal] dengan 2% kemungkinan per attribute level saat menggunakan [Heal].

column4: Skill magic circle of [Deprotected Zone] akan mengikuti musuh terdekat.

column2: Your Magic Circle of [Monstrance] will follow nearby monsters.

column3: 스킬 [래피드파이어] 챠지 중 방향회전이 가능해집니다(샷 하면 회전 불가능)

column2: Fixes the number of stone bullets picked by [Stone Picking] to be [skill level].

column4: Jumlah Stone Bullet yang dapat diambil dari [Stone Picking] sesuai dengan [skill level].

column2: Rotation time of [Broom Trap] decreases by 0.2 seconds per attribute level and number of rotations decreases by 1 per attribute level.

column4: Watu rotasi dari [Broom Trap] berkurang 0.2 detik per attribute level dan jumlah dari waktu durasi berkurang 1 per attribute level.

column2: Number of enemies hit by [Claymore] increases by 1 per Attribute level.

column4: Jumlah musuh yang diserang menggunakan [Claymore] meningkat 1 per Attribute level.

column2: Enemies blown away with [Punji Steak] receive fall damage equal to 50% of character's Physical attack.

column4: Musuh yang dihembus degan [Punji Steak] menerima damage jatuh sama dengan 50% dari karakter Physical attack.

column2: Increases the number of magic circles that can be detonated with [Detonate Traps] by 1 per attribute level.

column4: Meningkatkan jumlah dari Lingkaran Magic yang dapat meledak dari [Detonate Traps] sebanyak 1 per attribute level.

column2: Monster affected by [Pointing] are inflicted with [fear] with a 10% chance per attribute level.

column4: Musuh yang terkena efek [Pointing] akan terkena juga [fear] dengan 10% kemungkinan per attribute level.

column2: Poison reserves of [poison pot] increase by 20%
Deals additional damage equal to 50% physical damage after the first attack made with [Cloaking].

column2: Duration of [Sneak Hit] increases by 2 seconds per attribute level.

Set up a base camp for your party members. A personal shop can be used along with increasements for your buff durations.
column3: 파티원들에게 거점을 설치합니다. 개인상점이 이용가능하고 버프시간이 증가합니다.
column4: Membuat Base Camp untuk Tim kamu. Toko Pribadi dapat digunakan untuk meningkatkan Buff Durasi.

column2: Open a shop to enhance gems. Decreases the penalty on abilities from enhanced gems.
column3: 젬을 강화시켜주는 상점을 개설합니다. 강화된 젬은 패널티 능력치가 감소합니다.
column4: Membuka Toko Peningkatan Gem. Mengurangi Penalti untuk abiliti dari peningkatan gem.

column2: Synthesize two weapons to change the basic options. The outcome may be better or worse. Weapon used as material becomes destroyed.
column3: 두 개의 무기를 합성하여 기본 성능을 변화시킵니다. 성능이 더 좋아질 수도 나빠질 수도 있습니다. 재료로 사용된 무기는 소멸됩니다.
column4: Sintestis dua senjata kembali menjadi option dasar. Hasil yang didapat bisa lebih baik ataupun kurang. Senjata yang digunakan sebagai material akan hancur.

column2: Prevented from becoming incapable of combat once.
column4: Melindungi untuk terkena efek Incapable of Combat suatu waktu.

column2: Critical rate is higher when attacking from behind.
column4: Kemungkinan kritikal akan meningkat ketika serang dari belakang.

column2: Periodic decrease of SP and damage
Your companion growls fearfully. Nearby monsters may fall under Fear.
column3: 컴패니언이 무섭게 으르렁거림. 근처에 온 몬스터는 공포에 걸릴 수 있습니다.
column4: Companion kamu akan bergeram penuh ketakutan. Monster sekitar akan terkena efek ketakutan.

column2: Pull enemies within range of [Carve World Tree]
column3: 스킬 [세계수 조각] 범위안에 있는 적을 끌어 당깁니다.
column4: Menarik musuh dengan jarak dari [Caraver World Tree]

column2: Increases the Fire, Ice and Lightning properties while decreasing the Poison and Earth properties when using [Resist Elements] by 5 per attribute level respectively.
column3: 스킬 [레지스트 엘리멘츠] 사용 시 불, 얼음, 전기속성 저항이 특성 레벨 당 5 증가하고 독, 땅속성 저항이 특성 레벨 당 5 감소합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan Properti Fire, Ice and Lightning sementara itu mengurangi Properti Poison dan Earth ketika menggunakan [Resist Elements] sebanyak 5 per masing-masing attribute level.

column2: Enhanced the damage of [Meteor] to Elementalist's 2nd Circle standards.
column4: Meningkatkan damage dari [Meteor] Elementalist's 2nd Circle standards.

column2: Enhanced the damage of [Meteor] to Elementalist's 3rd Circle standards.
column4: Meningkatkan damage dari [Meteor] Elementalist's 3rd Circle standards.

column2: Enhanced the damage of [Prominence] to Elementalist's 2nd Circle standards.
column4: Meningkatkan damage dari [Prominence] Elementalist's 2nd Circle standards.

column2: Enhanced the damage of [Prominence] to Elementalist's 3rd Circle standards.
column4: Meningkatkan damage dari [Prominence] Elementalist's 3rd Circle standards.

column2: Enhanced the damage of [Hail] to Elementalist's 2nd Circle standards.
column4: Meningkatkan damage dari [Hail] Elementalist's 2nd Circle standards.

column2: Enhanced the damage of [Hail] to Elementalist's 3rd Circle standards.
column4: Meningkatkan damage dari [Hail] Elementalist's 3rd Circle standards.

column2: Enhanced the damage of [Electrocute] to Elementalist's 2nd Circle standards.
column4: Meningkatkan damage dari [Electrocute] Elementalist's 2nd Circle standards.

column2: Enhanced the damage of [Electrocute] to Elementalist's 3rd Circle standards.
column4: Meningkatkan damage dari [Electrocute] Elementalist's 3rd Circle standards.

column2: Increases the Damage of [Swell left Arm] Increase per Attribute level.
column3: 특성 레벨당 [왼팔 강화] 공격력 강화 효과가 상승합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan damage dari [Swell left Arm] Meningkat per Attribute level.

column2: Enhanced the increased attack effect of [Swell Left Arm] to Thaumaturge's 2nd Circle standards.
column3: [왼팔 강화] 공격력 증가 효과가 쏘마터지 2서클 수준으로 강화됩니다.
column4: Meningkatkan efek dari attack tambahan dari [Swell Left Arm] Thaumaturge's 2nd Circle standards.

column2: Enhanced the increased attack effect of [Swell Left Arm] to Thaumaturge's 3rd Circle standards.
column3: [왼팔 강화] 공격력 증가 효과가 쏘마터지 3서클 수준으로 강화됩니다.
column4: Meningkatkan efek dari attack tambahan dari [Swell Left Arm] Thaumaturge's 3rd Circle standards.

column2: Use [Thrust] on stunned enemies for additional Bleed effect.
column3: 스턴이 걸린 적에게 [쓰러스트]를 사용하면 출혈 효과가 추가로 부여됩니다.
column4: Menggunakan [Thrust] pada musuh yang terkena stun akan memberikan efek Bleed.

column2: Enemies blocked by [Cross Guard] temporarily become vulnerable to stab attacks.
column3: [크로스 가드]에 막힌 적은 잠시 동안 찌르기 공격에 취약해집니다.
column4: Musuh yang terblock dari [Cross Guard] sementara akan menjadi lemah untuk diberikan serangan Stab.

column2: Using Fire property attacks to finish enemies will cause an explosion and splash damage.
column3: 방어력 약화된 적을 불 속성 공격으로 마무리 하면 폭발이 일어나 스플래시 피해를 입힙니다.
column4: Menggunakan attack berelemen Fire untuk membunuh musuh akan menyebabkan efek ledakan dan damage sekitar.

column2: Using Ice Property attacks to finish enemies will slow down nearby enemies.
column3: 방어력 약화된 적을 얼음 속성 공격으로 마무리 하면 주변 적들의 움직임이 느려집니다.
column4: Menggunakan attack berelemen Ice untuk membunuh musuh akan melambatkan musuh sekitar.

column2: Using sword attacks on enemies with [Depreotected Zone] decreases defense.
column3: [디프로텍티드 존]에 걸린 적에게 검 공격 시, 방어력이 더욱 약해집니다.
column4: Menggunakan Sword Attack pada musuh di [Depreotected Zone] akan mengurangi Defense.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use sword handle to smack enemy.{nl}Attack stunned enemies for additional damage. Damage ignore bonus applies to small and medium sized monsters.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}칼의 손잡이로 적을 때립니다.{nl}스턴상태의 적을 공격하면 추가대미지를 주고, 소, 중형 몬스터에게 방어력 무시 보너스가 있습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan Pedang yang dipegang untuk memukul musuh.{nl}Attack musuh yang terkena stun akan mendapatkan damage tambahan. Mengabaikan Damage Bonus yang diberikan ke monster ukuran small dan medium.
Attack Power #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Mengabaikan Defense pada Target kecil dan sedang #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Splash #{SkillSR}#

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Perform a side slash on enemies.{nl}Enemies afflicted with [Bleeding] take additional damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}{nl}적을 좌우로 베어 버립니다.{nl}출혈 상태의 적을 공격하면 추가대미지를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Memberikan tebasan di sekitar musuh.{nl}Musuh yang terkena status [Bleeding] akan menerima damage tambahan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Throw shield to attack. Shield falls on the ground and must be picked up to reuse.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [타격]{/}{/}{nl}자신의 방패를 던져 적에게 피해를 줍니다. 실드랍에 쓰인 방패는 지면에 떨어져 있으며, 이를 주워야 재사용이 가능합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Melempar Shield untuk menyerang. Shield yang jatuh ke tanah harus diambil kembali untuk digunakan.

column2: Change to stance using Shield. Block and Critiacal resistance increase but basic attack decreases.
column3: 방패를 앞세우는 스탠스로 전환합니다. 블럭과 치명타 저항이 증가하지만, 기본 공격의 위력이 감소합니다.
column4: Mengganti Stance dengan Shield. Block and Kekebalan Critical meningkat tetapi Attack berkurang.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Use the edge of your shield to attack and slash enemies.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan sisi shield untuk menyerang dan menebas musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use the back of a knife to strike and push away enemies. The enemy becomes afflicted with Armor Break (Permanent on monsters)
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [타격]{/}{/}{nl}적을 칼등으로 후려쳐 옆으로 밀쳐냅니다. 적은 아머 브레이크 상태가 됩니다. (몬스터에게는 영구 지속)
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan bagian belakang pisau untuk menyerang dan mendorong musuh. Musuh akan terkena efek Armor Break (Permanent on monsters)

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Pierces enemies.{nl}A continuous attack bonus is applied depending on the enemy's size.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기]{/}{/}{nl}적을 강하게 찔러 피해를 줍니다.{nl}적 크기에 따라 연타 보너스가 적용 됩니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Menembus musuh.{nl}Attack Bonus berulang akan diberikan sesuai dengan ukuran musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Inflict damage on enemies by throwing your spear. The thrown spear on the ground can be re-used by picking it up.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기]{/}{/}{nl}자신의 창을 던져 적에게 피해를 줍니다. 투창에 쓰인 창은 지면에 떨어져 있으며, 이를 주워야 재사용이 가능합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Melempar tombok untuk menyerang musuh. Tombak yang jatuh ketanah harus diambil kembali untuk digunakan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Gather force and smash the ground with your weapon to attack the target.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [타격]{/}{/}{nl}힘을 모아 무기로 지면을 내려쳐 적을 공격합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Mengumpulkan Force dan memukul ke tanah dengan Senjata pada target.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Swing your spear overhead to continuously attack enemies in front of you.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}{nl}창을 머리위로 돌리면서 전방에 있는 적에게 연속된 공격을 합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Mengayunkan Tombak melewati Kepala dan melakukan damage berulang pada musuh di depan.

column2: Attack: #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Maximum Duration: 10 seconds{nl}Splash: #{SkillSR}#{nl}Able to use while riding
column4: Attack Power #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Max. Durasi 10 detik{nl}Splash #{SkillSR}#{nl}Dapat digunakan ketika riding

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Tie enemy with rope and drag it.{nl}Enemy received damage every time it is pulled and falls under Bleed state when released.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [타격]{/}{/}{nl}적을 줄로 묶어서 끌고 다닙니다.{nl}이동할 때 마다 적에게 피해를 주고, 풀려난 후 적은 출혈 상태에 빠집니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Mengikat musuh dengan tali dan menariknya.{nl}Musuh menerima damage setiap waktu ketika ditarik dan terkena efek Blind serta Bleed ketika terlepas.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Release a powerful stab into an enemy, then kick it away with your foot.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Melepaskan Serangan yang kuat ke musuh lalu menendangnya menggunakan kakimu.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Make solid landing when jumping or on air to damage enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [타격]{/}{/}{nl}점프 중이거나 공중에 있을 때, 강하게 착지하여 대상에게 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Membuat Solid Landing ketika Lompat atau terlempar keudara dan memberikan damage ke musuh.

column2: Open shop for repairing weapons. ATK is added when repaired.
column3: 무기를 손질할 수 있는 상점을 개설합니다. 손질된 무기에는 공격력이 더해집니다.
column4: Membuka toko untuk memperbaiki senjata. ATK ditambahkan ketika diperbaiki.

column2: Increases attack equal to [Skill Level]×[Number of Weapon Stars]{nl}Attack Count: #{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}Duration: 4 hour
column4: Attack bertambah sama dengan [Skill Level]×[Number of Weapon Stars]{nl}Attack Count: #{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}Durasi: 4 Jam

column2: Open shop for repairing armors. Only top, pants, and shield can be repaired. Physical defense is added when repaired.
column3: 방어구를 손질할 수 있는 상점을 개설합니다. 상의, 하의, 방패만 가능하며 손질된 방어구에는 물리 방어력이 더해집니다.
column4: Membuka toko untuk memperbaiki Armor. Hanya top, pants, dan shield yang dapat diperbaiki. Physical defense akan ditambahkan ketika diperbaiki.

column2: Open shop to repair equipments. Item can be repaired beyond max. durability.
column3: 장비를 수리해주는 상점을 개설합니다. 최대 내구도보다 더 높은 수치로 수리가 가능합니다.
column4: Membuka Toko untuk memperbaiki Equip. Item akan diperbaiki dengan beyond max. durabiliti.

column2: You're holding the enemy tied on rope. You can also hold the boss monsters.
column3: 적을 줄에 묶어 잡고 있습니다. 보스 몬스터도 잡고 있을 수 있습니다.
column4: Kamu akan memegang musuh dengan ikatan tali. Kamu dapat menahan Boss Monster.

column2: Set up a base camp in a field. Party members can use the base camp for personal storage and can freely warp to it.
column3: 필드 위에 거점을 설치합니다. 거점을 통해 파티원들은 개인 창고를 이용할 수 있으며 거점으로 자유롭게 워프할 수 있습니다.
column4: Membangun basecamp di field. Anggota Party dapat meminta Basecamp untuk storage pribadi dan dapat secara gratis teleport ke basecamp.

column2: Set up a refreshment table where you can share food with party members. It can be set up nearby a base camp and it will disbanded when the base camp is disbanded.
column3: 파티원들과 함께 음식을 먹을 수 있는 배식대를 설치합니다. 거점 주변에서만 설치 할 수 있고, 거점이 철거되면 배식대도 같이 철거됩니다.
column4: Membangun Distribusi Meja Makanan dimana kamu dapat berbagi dengan Anggota Party. Ini dapat dibangun dekat Basecamp dan akan menghancurkan Basecamp tersebut.

column2: Increases the food effectivenes by skill level
column4: Meningkatkan efektivitas food dengan skill level

column2: Stick flag that boosts the combat abilities of the pirates on the ground. Kill enemies continuously for fever combo.
column3: 해적단의 전투 능력을 고양시키는 깃발을 지면에 꽂습니다. 적을 연속으로 잡으면 피버 콤보가 발동됩니다.
column4: Bendera akan memberikan efek tambahan terhadap combat abiliti Pirate di area. Membunuh musuh akan mendapatkan Fever Combo secara berulang.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use Iron Hook to drag enemy. Enemy receives damage every time it is pulled.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [타격]{/}{/}{nl}아이언 후크로 포획한 적을 끌고 옵니다. 적은 끌려올 때마다 피해를 받습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan Iron Hook untuk menarik musuh. Musuh akan menerima damage setiap waktu ketika ditarik.

column3: 잠겨 있는 보물상자를 열 수 있습니다.

column2: Able to open treasure chests below Lv #{CaptionRatio}#
Temporarily connects your basic attacks and dagger attacks.
column3: 일시적으로 기본 공격과 단검 공격을 빠르게 연계 할 수 있습니다.
column4: Sementara menghubungkan basic attack dan dagger attack.

column2: Able to use the dagger without delay from the basic attack
column3: 기본 공격 모션 후 딜레이 없이 단검 사용 가능
column4: Dapat menggunakan sword kanan setelah basic attack

column3: 부대원을 모집할 수 있는 포메이션을 펼칩니다.

column2: Change to Phalanx formation. All blocks of troops are concentrated to the front three troops.
column3: 포메이션을 팔랑크스 포메이션으로 변경합니다. 부대원의 모든 블럭을 맨 앞열 3명에게 몰아줍니다.
column4: Mengubah menjadi Formasi Phalanx. Semua Block dari Pasukan akan terkonsentrasi terhadap tiga pasukan terdepan.

column2: Block increases for troop in front{nl}Rest of troops : 0 block
column3: 맨 앞 부대원 블럭 증가{nl}나머지 부대원 블럭 0
column4: Block meningkat untuk Pasukan di depan{nl}Sisa Pasukan : 0 block

column2: Change to Tersio formation. Defense of troops in the front row increase and call enemy's attention.
column3: 포메이션을 테르시오 포메이션으로 변경합니다. 앞열 부대원의 방어력이 증가하고 적의 주의를 끕니다.
column4: Mengubah menjadi Formasi Tersio. Defense dari pasukan di baris depan akan meningkat  dan dapat menarik perhatian musuh.

column2: Change to Winged formation. Defense of enemies in front is decreased.
column3: 포메이션을 윙드 포메이션으로 변경합니다. 윙드 포메이션 앞에 있는 적들은 방어력이 감소합니다.
column4: Berubah menjadi Formasi Winged. Defense musuh didepan akan berkurang.

column2: Change to Wedge formation. Attack of the troop in front applies as continuos attack.
column3: 포메이션을 웨지 포메이션으로 변경합니다. 맨 앞에 있는 부대원의 공격이 연타로 적용됩니다.
column4: Berubah menjadi Formasi Wedge. Attack dari pasukan didepan akan menghasilkan damage berulang.

column2: Change to Schiltron formation. All troops hold their weapons up high and enemies are blown away.
column3: 포메이션을 스킬트론 포메이션으로 변경합니다. 모든 부대원들은 무기를 치켜 든채로 서있고, 포메이션에 닿은 적은 멀리 날아갑니다.
column4: Berubah menjadi Formasi Schiltron. Semua pasukan akan menahan Senjatanya keatas dan musuh akan dihempaskan and enemies are blown away.

column2: Enemy approaching is pushed far back
column4: Musuh yang mendekat akan didorong jauh kebelakang

column2: Change to Testudo formation. All troops move in a defense stance with their shields up front.
column3: 포메이션을 테스튜도 포메이션으로 변경합니다. 모든 부대원들이 방패를 앞 세운 방어적인 자세로 천천히 이동합니다.
column4: Berubah menjadi Formasi Testudo. Semua pasukan akan bergerak menjadi defense stance dengan Shield didepan.

column2: Attack - #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Defense increase as much as increased attack
column3: 공격력 #{CaptionRatio}#% 감소{nl}감소된 공격력 만큼 방어력 증가
column4: Attack - #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Defense meningkat sesuai dengan damage yang bertambah

column2: The direction you face become front
column4: Arah kamu akan menjadi di depan

column2: When taking damage, your attack speed and attack are increased, but your defense is decreased.
column3: 자신의 공격속도가 증가하며, 공격을 받을 때마다 자신의 공격력은 증가하고, 방어력은 감소합니다.
column4: Ketika menerima damage, kecepatan serangan dan attack akan bertambah, tapi defense kamu akan berkurang.

column2: Temporarily grants a high resistance to being affected by knock back, knock down or staggered.
column3: 일시적으로 피해를 입어도 몸이 경직되지 않으며, 밀려나거나 넘어지지도 않습니다.
column4: Memberikan kekebalan yang tinggi sementara waktu terhadap knock back, knock down, atau staggered

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use back of sword to smack down enemy.
Kill the enemy within set attack counts for additional EXP and rewards. But damage and Incapable of combate penalty also increases while the effects last.
column3: 정해진 공격 횟수 안에 적을 죽이면 경험치와 보상을 더 받습니다. 하지만 효과가 지속될 동안 받는 피해와 전투불능 패널티도 증가합니다.
column4: Membunuh musuh dengan set jumlah serangan akan mendapatkan tambahan EXP dan hadiah. Tetapi damage dan juga Combat penalti meningkatkan ketika efek berlangsung.

column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}{nl}빠르게 회전 하면서 주변 적들에게 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Secara cepat berubah damage ke sekitar musuh.

column2: Grow target's right hand and increase defense.
column4: Menumbuhkan Tangan kanan pada target dan meningkatkan Defense.

column2: Grow target's head and increase INT.
column4: Menumbuhkan Kepala pada target dan meningkatkan INT.

column2: Let it rain in a targeted area. The rain provides various effects.
column3: 지정한 위치에 비를 내리게 합니다. 비는 다양한 효과를 부여합니다.

column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan pisau tangan untuk memukul musuh jatuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Shortly stretch hands to push away target and exhause target's SP. Target temporarily received continuous damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [타격]{/}{/}{nl}손을 짧게 뻗어 대상을 밀쳐내고, SP를 소진시킵니다. 맞은 대상은 잠시동안 지속적인 피해를 받습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Seketika meregangkan tangan untuk mendorong musuh yang menyebabkan keletihan pada SP target. Target sementara menerima damage berkelanjutan

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Gather force and shoot forward. Target hit is pushed back and receives damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [타격]{/}{/}{nl}기를 모은 뒤 전방을 향해 발사합니다. 맞은 대상은 점점 뒤로 밀려나며 피해를 받습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Mengumpulkan force dan menembakkan kedepan. Target yang diserang akan didorong mundur dan menerima damage

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Throw coin to attack enemy. Max SP of target decrease temporarily.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [타격]{/}{/}{nl}대상에게 자신이 소지한 동전을 날려 피해를 줍니다. 맞은 대상은 최대 SP가 일시적으로 줄어듭니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Melempar Coin untuk memukul musuh. Max SP dari target juga menurun sementara.

column2: Long range projectile, can defend magic
column4: Projectile Jarak Jauh, dan defend magic

column2: Make a despeller that can block harmful magic and effects.
column3: 해로운 마법이나 효과를 막아낼 수 있는 디스펠러를 제작합니다.
column4: Membuat despeller dapat memblock Magic dan efek yang merugikan.

column2: Activate to defend automatically{nl}Use 1 despeller after defense
column3: 소지 후 활성화하면 자동으로 방어{nl}방어 후 디스펠러 1개 소비
column4: Aktifkan untuk defend secara otomatis{nl}menggunakan 1 despeller setelah defense

column2: Make part of your skills into scrolls.
column3: 자신이 갖고 있는 스킬의 일부를 주문서로 만들어냅니다.
column4: Membuat bagian dari skill kamu menjadi Scrolls.

column2: Open shop for giving usefull effects of your skill to other players.
column3: 자신이 갖고 있는 스킬의 이로운 효과를 대상에게 부여해주는 상점을 개설합니다.
column4: Membuka Toko yang memberikan segala jenis efek yang menguntungkan dari setiap skill dari player.

column2: Can register skill that use item
column4: Dapat mendaftarkan skill dari item yang digunakan

column3: 파티원과 전방의 있는 대상의 상태이상을 치료합니다.

column2: Heal Party members{nl}Heal #{CaptionRatio}# players in front
column4: Heal anggota Party{nl}Heal #{CaptionRatio}# Player yang didepan

column2: Open shop to buy-in items from other players.
column3: 타인의 물건을 매입할 수 있는 상점을 개설합니다.
column4: Membuka toko yang dapat membeli item dari player lain.

column3: 대상의 해로운 효과의 지속시간을 강제로 증가시킵니다.

column2: Transform into the monster last shap shifted
column3: 가장 최근에 쉐입시프팅으로 변신했던 몬스터로 변신합니다.
column4: Berubah menjadi Monster di waktu terakhir berubah

column2: Plants in target area protects allies.
column3: 지정한 위치에 있는 식물들이 아군을 보호합니다.
column4: Menanam tanaman di area untuk melindungi teman.

column2: Plant grows in target area. Monsters within the targeted area temporarily become Plant-type monsters.
column3: 지정한 지면에 식물이 자랍니다. 해당 지역에 들어온 몬스터는 일시적으로 식물형 몬스터가 됩니다.
column4: Menanam tanaman yang tumbuh di area target. Monster yang berada di area tersebut akan berubah menjadi Plant-type Monsters.

column2: Summon the monster somewhere in the map to right in front.
column3: 해당 맵 어딘가에 있을 몬스터를 자신의 앞에 소환합니다.
column4: Summon monster pada suatu tempat di peta tepat di depan

column2: Increase max. SP and STA of party members
column4: Meningkatkan max. SP and STA anggota party

column2: Change the monster in fron to another monster.
column3: 전방에 있는 몬스터를 다른 몬스터로 변경합니다.
column4: Mengubah monster di depan menjadi monster lain dengan level yang sama

column2: Preview item that the monster will drop
column4: Memprediksi item yang akan dijatuhkan oleh monster

column3: 자신 주변에 존재한 모든 마법효과를 무효화 시킵니다.
column4: Membatalkan semua magic effect di sekitarmu.

column2: Show enemy's attack range for a while.
column4: Memperlihatkan jarak serang musuh sementara waktu.

column2: Change item that the monster will drop.
column3: 몬스터가 떨어뜨릴 아이템을 다른 아이템으로 변경합니다.
column4: Mengubah item yang akan dijatuhkan oleh monster.

column2: Sentence death to target. Target dies after certain time.
column3: 대상에게 죽음을 선고합니다. 죽음을 선고받은 대상은 일정 시간 후 반드시 죽습니다.
column4: Kalimat Kematian to target. Target mati dalam waktu tertentu

column2: Increased combat abilities of the Pirates. It becomes stronger when Fever Combo is activated.
column3: 해적단의 전투 능력이 증가합니다. 피버 콤보가 발동 되면 더욱 강해집니다.
column4: Kemampuan bertarung dari pirate meningkat. Menjadi lebih kuat ketika fever combo aktif

column2: Can use moving shot while running
column4: Dapat menggunakan Moving Shot ketika berlari

column2: When enemies are killed with [Revive], two monsters appear at rate of 1% per attribute level.
column3: 스킬 [환생]에 걸린적이 죽고 살아날때 특성 레벨 당 1% 확률로 두마리가 나타납니다.
column4: Ketika musuh dibunuh dengan [Revive], dua monster akan muncul pada nilai 1% per attribute level.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use bump of shield to attack.{nl}Block enemy's attack first then attack for additional damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}방패 돌기를 이용해 공격합니다.{nl}적의 공격을 블럭후 공격하면 추가대미지를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan Shield untuk menyerang.{nl}Menangkis serangan pertama musuh kemudian memberikan damage tambahan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use corner of shield to attack.{nl}Attack petrifies, frozen enemies for additional damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}방패 모서리를 이용해 공격합니다.{nl}석화, 결빙상태의 적을 공격하면 추가대미지를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan ujung tameng untuk menyerang.{nl}Serangan Petrifies, musuh yang membeku menerima damage tambahan

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Throw shield to attack enemy. Shield falls on the ground and it must be picked up to reuse.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}자신의 방패를 던져 적에게 피해를 줍니다. 실드랍에 쓰인 방패는 지면에 떨어져 있으며, 이를 주워야 재사용이 가능합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Melempar tameng untuk menyerang musuh. Tameng yang jatuh ke tanah harus diambil kembali untuk digunakan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Attach using corner of the shield then slash.
{#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Gather force and smash the ground with your weapon to attack the target.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}힘을 모아 무기로 지면을 내려쳐 대상을 공격합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Mengambil Force dan memukul ke tanah dengan senjata pada target.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Smash the head of an enemy. Temporarily reduces the target's INT and SPR.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}적의 머리 부분을 강하게 내려쳐 공격합니다. 적의 지능과 정신력을 일시적으로 감소시킵니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menyerang kepala musuh. Sementara menurunkan INT dan SPR pada target.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use the back of a knife to strike and push away an enemy. The enemy falls under Armor Break (Permanent on monsters)
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}적을 칼등으로 후려쳐 옆으로 밀쳐냅니다. 적은 아머 브레이크 상태가 됩니다. (몬스터에게는 영구 지속)
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan bagian belakang pisau untuk memukul dan mendorong musuh. Musuh akan terkena efek Armor Break (Permanent pada monster)

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use your shield and spear to attack enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}방패와 창을 이용해 적을 공격하여 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan Tameng dan Tombak untuk menyerang musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}March forward while holding down the key. Enemies nearby are hit with the shield and will fall down.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}키를 누르고 있는 동안 방패를 들고 전진합니다. 근접한 대상은 방패에 부딪혀 넘어집니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Berbaris maju ketika menekan tombol bawah. Musuh sekitar akan terkena serangan dari Tameng dan jatuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use your shield to smack enemies. There is a high chance the target becomes afflicted with [Blind].
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}방패로 대상을 강하게 내려쳐 피해를 줍니다. 대상은 높은 확률로 암흑 상태에 빠집니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan shield untuk memukul musuh. Target akan terkena efek darkness dengan kemungkinan yang tinggi

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use your shield to interrupt enemies.{nl}The target becomes afflicted with [Unbalanced].
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}방패로 적의 행동을 방해합니다.{nl}대상은 언밸런스 상태에 빠집니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan tameng untuk mengganggu musuh.{nl}Target akan terkena efek unbalanced status.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Use your shield as a lead and march forward while holding down the key. Release the key to launch a slash on the enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}{nl}키를 누르고 있는 동안 방패를 앞세워 전진함. 키를 떼면 칼을 치켜올려 대상을 베어버립니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan tameng untuk memimpin dan maju kedepan ketika menekan tombol. Melepaskan tombol untuk menyerang musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Gather up power and use your weapon to attack targets by smashing it to the ground.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}힘을 모아 무기로 지면을 내려쳐 적을 공격합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Mengumpulkan kekuatan dan menggunakan senjatamu untuk menyerang target dengan melemparkannya ke tanah.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Rush forward with power to throw your target away.
{#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Gather up power to release a strong stab to an enemy.
{#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Tie enemy and drag around.{nl}Enemy is damaged when moving and Bleeds when released.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}적을 줄로 묶어서 끌고 다닙니다.{nl}이동할 때 마다 적에게 피해를 주고, 풀려난 후 적은 출혈 상태에 빠집니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Mengikat musuh dan menarik sekeliling.{nl}Musuh akan terkena damage ketika bergerak dan terkena efek Bleed ketika lepas.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Make solid landing while jumping or on air to damage enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}점프 중이거나 공중에 있을 때, 강하게 착지하여 대상에게 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Membuat Solid Landing ketika lompat atau bertarung diudara untuk memukul musuh

column2: Install base camp in field. Party members can sue the base camp for personal storage and can freely warp to base camp.
column3: 필드 위에 베이스 캠프을 설치합니다. 베이스 캠프를 통해 파티원들은 자유롭게 워프 할 수 있으며, 개인 창고를 이용할 수 있습니다.
column4: Memasang basecamp di area. Anggota party dapat menggunakan Basecamp untuk Storage pribadi dan dapat secara gratis teleport ke basecamp.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use Iron Hook to pull enemy. Enemy receives damage every time it is pulled.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}아이언 후크로 포획한 적을 끌고 옵니다. 적은 끌려올 때마다 피해를 받습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan Iron Hook untuk menarik musuh. Musuh akan menerima damage setiap waktu ditarik.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use back of sword to hit smash enemy.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan bagian belakang pedang untuk memukul musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Summon huge snowball and damage nearby enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [얼음] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}거대한 눈 덩어리를 소환해 주변 대상에게 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Memanggil Bola Salju Raksasa dan memberikan serangan ke musuh sekitar.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Collect corpse fragments when monsters are killed using this attack.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법]{/}{/}{nl}이 공격으로 몬스터가 죽을 때 시체 파편을 수집합니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Mengumpulkan pecahan mayat ketika monster terbunuh menggunakan serangan ini.

column4: Attack Power #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Mengumpulkan pecahan mayat dari segala tipe monster

column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법]{/}{/}{nl}지정한 위치에 시체 파편을 날려 대상에게 피해를 줍니다.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Make fragments of corpse surround you and damage nearby enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법]{/}{/}{nl}시체 파편을 자신 주위에 맴돌게 하여 근접한 대상에게 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan pecahan dari mayat disekitarmu dan memberikan damage sekitar musuh.

column2: Collect the corpse fragments left where the monster died.
column3: 몬스터가 죽은 자리에 남아있던 시체 파편을 수집합니다.
column4: Mengumpulkan bagian mayat yang tersisa ketika monster mati.
{#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Meletakkan Bomb pada anak panah dan menembakknya.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a stone-bullet that knocks back the target. The target has a chance to become afflicted with [Stun].
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}돌 탄환을 발사하여 대상을 밀쳐냅니다. 대상은 일정 확률로 스턴 상태에 빠집니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menembak stone-bullet yang dapat mendorong target kebelakang. Target memiliki kemungkinan terkena stun.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Destroy obstacles that block the way and damage enemies in front.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}이동을 가로막는 여러 종류의 장애물을 파괴하는 동시에 전방의 적들에게 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menghancurkan rintangan yang dapat menghadang jalan dan memberikan serangan ke musuh didepan.
{#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Memasang perangkap yang dapat memberikan damage ke target sekitar.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Explode magic circle and installation to damage enemies.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Meledakkan lingkarang sihir dan instalasi untuk damage musuh.

column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}불길이 올라오면서 해당 위치에 대상에게 피해를 줍니다.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Install bomb around target. Bomb explosed when touching enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}대상에게 주위를 맴도는 폭탄을 심어 놓습니다. 폭탄은 적에게 닿을 때 터지면서 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Memasang bomb disekitar target. Bomb meledak ketika menyentuh musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Shoot flash arrows on the ground. Flash pops and shoots sparks to enemies nearby.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}지면에 섬광 화살을 발사합니다. 섬광이 터진 곳은 불꽃이 튀면서 주변에 있는 대상에게 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menembakkan flash arrows pada tanah. Cahaya terbentuk dan menembak percikan pada musuh disekitar.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use this attack to explode enemy when it is killed. Strength of party members temporarily increase.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}이 공격으로 대상이 죽으면, 대상은 폭발하고 파티원의 힘이 일시적으로 증가합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan serangan ini untuk meledakkan musuh ketika terbunuh. Strength dari anggota party sementara akan meningkat.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Throw Lachrymator. Target affected fall into Blind state.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}지정한 위치에 최루탄을 던집니다. 최루에 당한 대상은 블라인드 상태에 빠집니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Melempar gas air mata. Target akan terkena efek Blind.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Zombies circle around specified area. Enemies that touch zombies are push away and receives damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}지정된 장소를 중심으로 좀비들이 줄지어 맴돕니다. 움직이는 좀비에 닿은 적은 뒤로 밀리며 대미지를 받습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Lingkara Zombie disekitar pada area tertentu. Musuh yang menyentuh zombie akan terdorong dan menerima damage.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Explode zombies in specific area and damage target enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법]{/}{/}{nl}지정한 위치에 있는 좀비를 폭파시켜 대상에게 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Meledakkan Zombie pada Area tertentu dan damage pada musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Flick enemies attacking nearby and cause damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}자신을 근접하여 공격하는 대상을 튕겨내고 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Mengulirkan musuh untuk menyerang musuh disekitar dan menyebabkan damage.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Make a short stretch to push away enemy and consume its SP. Target hit will receive continuous damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}손을 짧게 뻗어 대상을 밀쳐내고, SP를 소진시킵니다. 맞은 대상은 잠시동안 지속적인 피해를 받습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Membuat peregangan singkat untuk mendorong musuh dan memakan SP nya. Target akan terkena damage secara berulang.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Gather power to and strike forward. Targets are pushed back and receive damage..
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}기를 모은 뒤 전방을 향해 발사합니다. 맞은 대상은 점점 뒤로 밀려나며 피해를 받습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Mengumpulkan tenaga dan memukul kedepan. Targets akan terdorong dan menerima damage..

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Throw coin to attack target. Max. SP of targets hit will temporarily decrease.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}대상에게 자신이 소지한 동전을 날려 피해를 줍니다. 맞은 대상은 최대 SP가 일시적으로 줄어듭니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Melempar coin pada target. Max. SP dari target yang terkena serangan sementara akan berkurang.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Heals target and party members while damaging enemy.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [신성]{/}{/}{nl}파티원과 전방의 있는 대상의 상태이상을 치료하며, 적군에게는 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}menyembuhkan target dan anggota party ketika menyerang musuh.

column2: Attack #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Attack #{CaptionRatio}# enemies{nl}Heall all party members{nl}Heal #{CaptionRatio}# allies{nl}
column4: Attack Power #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Attack #{CaptionRatio}# musuh{nl}menyembuhkan semua anggota party{nl}Heal #{CaptionRatio}# allies{nl}

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Push the point of your weapon into enemies, performing a strong piercing attack.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기]{/}{/}{nl}적을 무기 끝으로 강하게 찔러 뒤로 밀쳐냅니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Mendorong titik kekuatan senjatamu kearah musuh, menciptakan serangan piercing yang kuat

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Inflict damage on an enemy with a powerful attack.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Memberikan damage ke musuh dengan kekuatan penuh.

column2: Become determined by temporarily increasing your attack, while decreasing your defense.
column3: 각오를 다져 일시적으로 자신의 공격력을 증가시키는 대신 방어력을 감소시킵니다.
column4: Memutuskan untuk meningkatkan seranganmu sementara waktu, sementara mengurangi pertahananmu.

column2: Lowers your maximum HP, but your attacks have a high chance of stunning enemies.
column3: 자신의 최대 HP를 낮추지만 공격한 적이 기절 상태가 될 확률이 생깁니다.
column4: Mengurangi jumlah max HP, tetapi seranganmu memiliki kemungkinan yang tinggi untuk memberikan Stun pada musuh.

column2: Chance of Stunning Enemy: #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Maximum HP: -#{CaptionRatio2}# {nl}Duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds

{#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Strike enemies with the hilt of your sword.{nl}Inflicts additional damage on stunned monsters, and partially ignores the defense of small and medium sized enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}칼의 손잡이로 적을 때립니다.{nl}기절 상태의 적에게는 추가 대미지를 주고, 소형, 중형 몬스터에게 방어력의 일부를 무시합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menyerang musuh dengan bagian gagang pedang.{nl}Memberikan tambahan damage pada monster yang terkena stun, dan mengabaikan defense dari musuh berukuran kecil dan medium.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use the bump of your shield to attack enemies. Deals additional damage to enemies staggered by a block.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}방패의 돌기를 이용해 적을 공격합니다. 블록 경직중의 적에게는 추가 대미지를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan benturan dari shield untuk menyerang musuh. Block memberikan damage tambahan pada musuh yang terkena stagger.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use the edge of your shield to attack enemies. Inflicts additional damage on both petrified and frozen enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}방패의 테두리를 이용해 적을 공격합니다. 석화, 결빙상태의 적을 공격하면 추가 대미지를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan ujung shield untuk menyerang musuh. Memberikan damage tambahan pada musuh yang terkena petrified dan frozen.

column2: Hit your shield to provoke nearby enemies making them pursue you.
column3: 방패를 두드려 주변의 적을 도발하여 자신을 쫓게 합니다.
column4: Memukul shield kamu untuk menarik perhatian musuh disekitar agar mengejarmu.

column2: Increases your defense while decreasing your attack. Cannot be used with Gung Ho.
column3: 자신의 공격력을 감소시키는 대신 방어력을 증가시킵니다. 스킬 겅호와 함께 사용할 수 없습니다.
column4: Meningkatkan pertahananmu sekaligus mengurangi attack kamu. Tidak dapat digunakan bersamaan dengan Gung Ho.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Throw shield to attack. Shield dropped on ground may disappear if not picked up within time limit.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}방패를 던져 적을 공격합니다. 던져진 방패는 제한 시간내 다시 줍지 않으면 사라져 버릴 수 있습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Melempar tameng untuk memukul. Tameng yang terjatuh ke tanah akan menghilang apabila tidak diambil pada waktu tertentu.

column2: Change to active stance using shield in front. Block and increases while attack and critical decrease.
column3: 방패를 앞세우는 적극적인 방어 스탠스로 전환합니다. 블록이 증가하지만 공격력과 치명타 발생이 감소합니다.
column4: Mengubah postur aktif dengan memposisikan shield di depan. Block meningkat sementara attack dan critical menurun.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Use your shield and sword to attack enemies with continuous attacks.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan perisai dan pedang untuk menyerang musuh dengan serangan beruntun.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Perform an upward swing with your weapon, launching an enemy.
{#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Smack your weapon down on an enemy's head. Temporarily decreases the target's INT and SPR.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}적의 머리 부분을 강하게 내려쳐 공격합니다. 일시적으로 적의 지능과 정신력을 감소시킵니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Memukulkan senjatamu ke kepala target. Mengurangi INT dan SPR target sementara waktu.

column2: Take a defensive stance, using your weapon to block. Blocked enemies become vulnerable to [Pierce] attacks.
column3: 무기를 이용하여 방어 자세를 취합니다. 방어 당한 직후의 적은 찌르기 공격에 취약한 상태가 됩니다.
column4: Mengambil posisi bertahan dengan menggunakan senjatamu untuk memblok. Musuh yang berhasil di blok akan menjadi rentan terkena serangan Pierce

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Inflict damage on enemies by swinging your sword around to create continuous attacks.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}{nl}검을 원형의 궤적으로 휘둘러 전방의 적에게 연속 공격을 가합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Mengayunkan pedang kesekitar dan memberikan damage berturut-turut.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Strike and push an enemy sidewards using the side of your sword. The enemy becomes afflicted with [Armor Break].
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}적을 칼의 넓은 옆면으로 후려쳐 옆으로 밀쳐냅니다. 적은 방어구 파괴 상태가 됩니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Memukul dan mendorong musuh kesamping menggunakan sisi pedangmu. Musuh akan terkena [Armor Break].

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Attack by piercing enemies with your spear. The larger an enemy is, the more consecutive hits you deal.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기]{/}{/}{nl}창으로 적을 강하게 찔러 피해를 줍니다. 적의 크기가 클수록 연타 보너스가 적용 됩니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Serangan menusuk musuh menggunakan tombak. Semakin besar musuh jumlah hit bertambah.

column2: Change to Window formation for active attack. Chance of critical increases but evasion decreases.
column3: 적극적으로 공격하는 창문자세 스탠스로 전환합니다. 치명타 발생이 증가하지만 회피가 감소합니다.
column4: Mengubah formasi jendela pada serangan aktif. Kemungkinan kritikal meningkat tapi evasion berkurang.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use your spear and shield to attack enemies. Deals additional damage when an attack is countered.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}방패와 창을 이용해 적을 공격하여 피해를 줍니다. 적의 공격에 카운터로 사용하면 추가적인 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan tombak dan tameng untuk menyerang musuh. Memberikan  damage tambahan ketika serangan di counter.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Throw spear to attack enemy. Spear dropped on ground may disappear if not picked up within time limit.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기]{/}{/}{nl}창을 던져 적을 공격합니다. 던져진 창은 제한 시간내 다시 줍지 않으면 사라져 버릴 수 있습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Melempar tombak pada musuh. Tombak yang jatuh pada tanah akan menghilang jika tidak diambil pada waktu tertentu.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use your shield and dash to push enemies away. Enemies nearby will fall down when hit with the shield.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}방패를 들고 적을 밀면서 달립니다. 근접한 적은 방패에 부딪혀 넘어집니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan tameng dan mendorong musuh. Musuh akan jatuh ketika diserang.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Attack with a powerful slash on the lower half of an enemy with a chance to paralyze.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}{nl}적의 하단을 강하게 공격합니다. 적은 일시적으로 행동이 마비될 수 있습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Secara kuat menyerang bagian bawah musuh dan memberikan kemungkinan paralyze

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use your shield to inflict damage on an enemy with a powerful smash. Has a chance to afflict [Blind] on the enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}방패로 적을 강하게 내려쳐 피해를 줍니다. 적은 확률에 따라 암흑 상태에 빠질 수 있습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan perisaimu untuk memberikan damage kepada musuh dengan cara membenturkannya. Memberikan kemungkinan [Blind] kepada musuh.

column2: Attack #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}DeStab the enemy in front of you, and make it more vulnerable to [Pierce] attacks.fense -#{CaptionRatio}# {nl}{#339999}{ol}[Unbalance]{/}{/} Duration 5 seconds
{#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Hold down the key to crouch and move forward. Increases evasion against enemy attacks and triggers an attack immediately after movement has ended.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}{nl}키를 누르고 있는 동안 자세를 낮추고 전방으로 전진합니다. 적의 공격에 대한 회피가 높아지며 이동이 끝난 직후 적을 공격합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Menahan key untuk membungkuk dan maju kedepan. Evasion meningkat terhadap serangan musuh dan menyerang musuh setelah berhenti bergerak.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use sword and shield to attack continuously.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}적에게 칼과 방패를 이용하여 연속 공격을 가합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan pedang dan tameng untuk menyerang musuh berulang.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Impales a small or medium-type monster with a spear. It is possible to attack other enemies with a skewered enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[찌르기]{/}{/}{nl}소형, 중형 몬스터를 창에 관통시켜 꽂고 다닙니다. 꽂힌 적을 이용하여 다른 적을 공격할 수 있습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Menusuk monster tipe small atau medium dengan tombak. Hal ini dimungkinkan untuk menyerang musuh lainnya dengan musuh ditusuk

column2: Increases your movement speed while riding.
column4: Meningkatkan Movement Speed saat mengendarai companion.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Inflict shock damage by dashing forward to an enemy in front of you.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menimbulkan kerusakan hebat dengan bergerak maju ke depan musuhmu.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Gather force and strongly stab enemy with the tip of your spear.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기]{/}{/}{nl}힘을 모아 적을 창 끝으로 강하게 찌릅니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Mengumpulkan kekuatan dan menusuk musuh dengan ujung tombak yang sangat kuat.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Twirl your spear overhead to attack enemies.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Memutar tombak diatas kepala untuk menyerang musuh.

column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}적을 잡아 끌고 다니며 지면에 마찰시켜 피해를 입힙니다.

column2: Increases your attack when you keep repeatedly attacking one particular enemy.
column3: 하나의 적을 연속으로 공격할수록 점점 공격력이 증가하는 상태가 됩니다.
column4: Meningkatkan seranganmu ketika menahan serangan berulang dari target musuh.

column2: Your attack hits target but chance of critical and critical evasion decreases?
column3: 자신의 공격이 반드시 명중하지만, 자신의 치명타 발생과 치명타 회피가 감소하는 상태가 됩니다.
column4: Serangan target memiliki kemungkinan kritikan dan evasion kritikal berkurang?

column2: Temporarily make pierce attacks be applied as repeated attacks.
column3: 일시적으로 자신의 찌르기 공격을 연타로 적용시킵니다.
column4: Sementara membuat Pierce Attack yang memberikan serangan berulang.

column2: Temporarily decrease defense of nearby enemies, and add that much to your ATK.
column3: 일시적으로 주변 적들의 방어력을 감소시키고, 감소시킨 방어력을 그만큼 자신의 공격력에 추가합니다.
column4: Sementara mengurangi Defense musuh dan menambah sama dengan jumlah attack.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Tramp down on enemy while on air or jumping.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}점프 중이거나 공중에 있을 때, 아래의 적을 강하게 내리밟아 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Melangkah di atas musuh sementara di udara atau melompat.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Charge forward while slashing, attacking any enemies that block your way.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Charge kedepan saat menebas, menyerang musuh apapun yang menghalangi jalanmu.

column2: USe centrifugal force to throw away enemy.
column3: 적을 잡아 원심력을 이용해 돌려서 힘껏 내던집니다.
column4: Gunakan gaya sentrifugal untuk melempar musuh.

column2: Open a shop to repair weapons and temporarily increase its performance.
column3: 무기를 손질하여 성능을 일시적으로 향상시키는 상점을 개설합니다.
column4: Membuka toko untuk memperbaiki senjata dan sementara meningkatkan performa.

column2: Open a shop to repair weapon and temporarily increase its performance. Physical defense is added. Repair is only for top, Pants, and Shield.
column3: 방어구를 손질하여 방어력을 일시적으로 향상시키는 상점을 개설합니다. 상의, 하의, 방패만 가능하며 손질된 방어구에는 물리 방어력이 더해집니다.
column4: Membuka toko untuk memperbaiki senjata dan sementara meningkatkan performa. Defensi fisik ditambahkan. Perbaikan hanya dapat dilakukan untuk Top, Pants dan Tameng.

column2: Open a shop to repair damaged equipment. It is possible for repaired equipment to exceed its maximum durability.
column3: 손상된 장비 아이템을 수리해주는 상점을 개설합니다. 최대 내구도보다 더 튼튼하게 수리하여 더 오래 사용할 수 있습니다.
column4: Membuka toko untuk memperbaiki item. Item yang diperbaiki memiliki tingkat durability lebih tinggi dari Max. durability.

column2: Bind all enemies, including boss monsters, to prevent them from moving.
column3: 보스 몬스터를 포함한 모든 적을 포박해 움직일 수 없게 만듭니다.
column4: Mengikat semua musuh, termasuk monster bos, untuk mencegah mereka dari bergerak.

column2: Install base camp for party members. Party members can use base camp as storage or for teleport.
column3: 필드 위에 파티원들을 위한 베이스캠프를 설치합니다. 파티원들은 캠프에서 개인 창고 및 순간 이동을 사용할 수 있습니다.
column4: Memasang Basecamp dari anggota party. Anggota party dapat menggunakan basecamp dapat menggunakan storage atau teleport.

column2: Duration: #{CaptionRatio}# hours{nl}Duration of the food effects is at least 30 minutes
column4: Durasi: #{CaptionRatio}# Jam{nl}Durasi dari food effect minimal 30 menit

column2: Set up a refreshment table to prepare dishes that temporarily increases the abilities of your party members. A refreshment table can only placed near a base camp. If the camp is removed, the refreshment table will be removed as well.
column3: 파티원들의 능력치를 일시적으로 향상시켜주는 요리를 준비할 수 있는 배식대를 설치합니다. 배식대는 베이스 캠프 주변에만 설치할 수 있고, 캠프가 철거되면 배식대도 함께 철거됩니다.
column4: Memasang Meja Refreshment untuk mempersiapkan makanan yang secara sementara meningkatkan kekuatan untuk anggota party. Meja Refreshment hanya dapat dibuat mendekati basecamp, dan jika camp dihancurkan maka meja refreshment akan dihilangkan juga.

column2: Ping a flag that boosts pirates' abilities. Kill enemies repeatedly near the flag for combo attack.
column3: 해적단의 전투 능력을 고양시키는 해적기를 꽂습니다. 해적기 주변에서 연속으로 적을 처치하면 콤보가 발동됩니다.
column4: Ping a flag that boosts pirates' abilities. Kill enemies repeatedly near the flag for combo attack.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Drag and pull enemies captured with Iron Hook. Enenues receives damage each time it is pulled.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}스킬 아이언 후크로 포획한 적을 당겨서 끌고 옵니다. 적은 끌려올 때마다 피해를 받습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menarik dan menyeret musuh yang tertangkap menggunakan iron hook. Musuh menerima damage setiap ditarik.

column2: Able to use your dagger{nl}without delay after normal attacks{nl}Duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds
column3: 기본 공격 모션 후{nl}딜레이 없이 단검 사용 가능{nl}지속시간 #{CaptionTime}#초
column4: Bisa menggunakan dagger{nl}Tanpa delay setelah serangan normal{nl}Durasi: #{CaptionTime}# detik

column2: Attack with chance of stealing enemy items.
column3: 공격시 확률적으로 적에게서 강제로 아이템을 약탈해옵니다.
column4: Serangan memiliki kemungkinan mencuri item musuh.

column2: Create a formation that calls on the squads members.
Change to the Phalanx formation. All of the squad members' block will be focused to the 3 in the front row.
column3: 팔랑크스 포메이션으로 전환합니다. 모든 부대원의 블록 능력을 맨 앞열의 3인에게 몰아줍니다.
column4: Berubah menjadi Formasi Phalanx. Konsentrasi untuk menahan skill dari semua pasukan di depan barisan.

column2: Change to the Tersio formation. Increases the defense of the squad member in the front row while provoking enemies.
column3: 테르시오 포메이션으로 전환합니다. 앞열 부대원의 방어력이 증가하고 적의 주의를 끕니다.
column4: Berubah menjadi Formasi Tersio. Defense baris terdepan meningkat dan memancing musuh.

column2: Change to the Crane Wing formation. Decreases the defense of enemies within the formation while targeting the leader.
column3: 학익진 포메이션으로 전환합니다. 포메이션 안에 들어온 적들은 방어력이 감소하고, 리더를 목표로 돌진합니다.
column4: Berubah menjadi Formasi Crane Wing. Berlari kedepan target dan defense musuh menjadi berkurang.

column3: 웨지 포메이션으로 전환합니다. 모든 부대원의 공격력을 선두에 선 부대원 1인에게 집중합니다.

column2: Change to the Schiltron formation. All squad members will stop at once while raising their weapons to prevent from enemies rushing in.
column3: 스킬트론 포메이션으로 전환합니다. 모든 부대원들은 무기를 치켜 든 채로 멈춰서서 적의 돌진을 막아냅니다.
column4: Berubah menjadi formasi Schiltron. Semua Pasukan berhenti dan mengangkat senjata untuk menahan musuh.

column2: Change to the Testudo formation. Increases the defense and block of all squad members while moving slowly.
column3: 테스튜도 포메이션으로 전환합니다. 모든 부대원들이 방어력 및 블록을 증가시키고 천천히 이동합니다.
column4: Berubah menjadi Formasi Testudo. Meningkatkan Defense dan Block dari semua pasukan dan bergerak lambat.

column2: Realign direction of formation to leader's view.
column3: 포메이션의 방향을 리더의 시선 방향으로 재정렬합니다.
column4: Meluruskan kembali arah dari pandangan pemimpin.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Hold your sword backwards and use its handle to smack down an enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}검을 거꾸로 쥐어 손잡이 부위로 적을 내려칩니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Memegang pedang mundur dan menggunakan pegangan untuk memukul jatuh musuh.

column2: Doubles your EXP and loot dropped when you defeat an enemy within a certain number of attacks. You take 3x damage while the effect is active, and lose more durability when you become incapable of combat.
column3: 정해진 공격 횟수 안에 적을 처치하면 경험치와 보상을 두 배로 받습니다. 하지만 효과가 지속될 동안 받는 피해는 세 배가 되며, 전투불능시 내구도 감소량도 대폭 증가합니다.
column4: Double Exp kamu dan hadiah ketika kamu mengalahkan musuh dengan sejumlah attack. Kamu menerima 3x damage ketika efek aktif dan mengurangi banyak durability ketika kamu tidak mampu bertempur.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Use centrifugal force to continuously attack enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}{nl}원심력을 이용해 빠르게 회전하면서 적들에게 연속적으로 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan gaya sentrifugal dan terus menerus menyerang musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Gather powerful magical energy to launch it towards an enemy. Increases the inflicted damage depending on the amount of gathered energy.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법]{/}{/}{nl}강력한 마법 에너지를 모아 적에게 발사합니다. 에너지를 모은 량에 비례하여 피해량도 증가합니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Mengumpulkan energi magic yang kuat untuk dilepaskan kepada musuh. Meningkatkan damage yang diciptakan tergantung dari jumlah energi yang terkumpul.

column2: Makes an enemy fall asleep. The enemy awakens once you've reached your limit of attacks.
column3: 적을 수면 상태로 만듭니다. 수면상태인 적은 공격 한계치에 도달하면 깨어납니다.
column4: Membuat musuh jatuh tertidur. Musuh akan terbangun ketika kamu mencapai batas serangan.

column2: Creates a protective shield that reflects the amplified damage back to an enemy.
column3: 적 공격의 일정량을 공격자에게 반사하는 방어막을 생성합니다.
column4: Menciptakan perisai pelindung yang dapat membalikkan dan melipatgandakan damage kepada musuh.
{#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Serangan berulang pada musuh dengan magic bullet.

column2: Reduces the casting time of skills.
{#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Summons a fireball. Enemies touching the fireball will receive continuous flame damage.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [불]{/}{/}{nl}화염구를 소환합니다. 화염구에 닿은 적은 지속적으로 화염 피해를 입습니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Memanggil Bola Api. Musuh yang tersentuh bola api akan menerima damage api secara berulang.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Creates a wall of flames that continuously damages approaching enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [불]{/}{/}{nl}화염의 벽을 만들어 접근한 적에게 지속적으로 화염 피해를 입힙니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Menciptakan tembok api yang dapat memberikan damage berulang mendekati musuh.

column2: Temporarily grants the Fire property to you and your party member's attacks.
column3: 자신과 파티원의 공격에 일시적으로 화염 속성을 부여합니다.
column4: Maningkatkan Fire property untuk mu dan anggota party sementara.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Inflicts damage by exploding a burning enemy.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Memberikan damage dengan kemungkinan meledak yang membakar musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Summons a pillar of fire to inflict damage on enemies.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Memanggil Pillar api untuk memberikan damage ke musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Attack by continuously fuming fire forward to enemies. Deals continuous flame damage to enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [불]{/}{/}{nl}전방을 향해 지속적으로 불을 뿜어 적을 공격합니다. 적은 지속적으로 화염 피해를 입습니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Serangan api yang menyembur secara terus menerus. Memberikan damage api ke musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Launches a bolt of ice to an enemy that inflicts damage and has a chance to freeze the enemy.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [얼음] - [찌르기]{/}{/}{nl}얼음의 화살을 날려 적에게 피해를 주고 일정 확률로 결빙 상태에 걸리게 합니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Meluncurkan Ice Bolt kemusuh untuk menciptakan damage dan memiliki kemungkinan membekukan musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice] - [Pierce]{/}{/}}{nl}Spurt ice thorns and attack enemies in front with chance of freezing.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [얼음] - [찌르기]{/}{/}}{nl}얼음 가시를 솟구치게 해 전방 일렬의 적들에게 피해를 주고 일정 확률로 결빙 상태에 걸리게 합니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice] - [Pierce]{/}{/}}{nl}Es Duri dan attack musuh di depan dengan kemungkinan membekukan.

column2: Creates a wall of ice that confines an enemy with a chance of freezing nearby enemies.
column3: 얼음의 벽을 만들어 적을 가두고 근접한 적을 일정 확률로 결빙 상태에 걸리게 합니다.
column4: Menciptakan tembok es untuk menjebak musuh dengan kemungkinan membekukan musuh disekitar.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Smack frozen enemies in front. Can freeze one more enemy nearby.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [얼음]{/}{/}{nl}전방의 결빙 상태의 적을 충격하여 피해를 줍니다. 주변의 적 하나를 추가로 결빙시킬 수 있습니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Memukul musuh yang membeku di depan. Dapat membekukan satu musuh lagi disekitar.

column2: Create ice tent to block and freeze enemy.
column3: 순간 얼음의 장막을 만들어 적의 공격을 방어하고 적을 결빙시킵니다.
column4: Menciptakan tenda es untuk menahan dan membekukan musuh.

column2: Create strong wind to push away target. Use on frozen enemies to attack neaby enemies.
column3: 강풍을 일으켜 적들을 밀쳐냅니다. 결빙된 적에게 사용하면 주변의 적들에게 피해를 줍니다.
column4: Menciptakan angin kuat untuk mendorong target. Menggunakan musuh yang beku untuk menyerang musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Ride on huge snowball and smash enemy.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menaiki Bola Salju besar untuk memukul musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Concentrate on the the tip of your hand to inflict continuous damage with psychokinesis.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법]{/}{/}{nl}손 끝에 염력을 집중하여 전방의 적에게 지속적인 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Berkonsentrasi pada ujung tangan Kamu untuk menimbulkan kerusakan terus menerus dengan psikokinesis.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Use psychokinesis to capture a target in front and throw it around.{nl}Inflicts damage by throwing the captured target in a direction using your arrow keys.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법]{/}{/}{nl}전방의 대상을 염력으로 잡아 위치를 이동시킵니다. 방향키를 이용하여 이동할 위치를 지정할 수 있으며, 던져진 적은 충격 피해를 입습니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Gunakan psikokinesis untuk menangkap target di depan dan membuangnya di sekitar.{nl}Memberikan damage dengan cara melempar target yang tertangkap menggunakan arah key.

column2: Swaps your position with that of the enemy.
{#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Inflict damage on multiple enemies by pulling them to a targeted area causing them to collide with each other.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법]{/}{/}{nl}지정한 위치의 대상을 한 점으로 끌어당겨 서로 충돌하게 해 피해를 입힙니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Memberikan damagae pada beberapa musuh dengan menarik dan membuat mereka saling bertabrakan dalam wilayah yang ditargetkan.

column2: Lift nearby enemies up into the air. Enemies in the air are temporarily detected as a Flying-type.
column3: 자신 주변의 적들을 공중으로 들어 올립니다. 들어 올려진 적들은 일시적으로 비행형으로 판정합니다.
column4: Mengangkat musuh terdekat ke udara. Musuh di udara untuk sementara terdeteksi sebagai Flight-type.

column2: Create a straight line gravitational force that pull the enemies.
column3: 일자 형태의 중력장을 생성하여 주변의 적들을 일렬로 끌어당겨 정렬합니다.
column4: Membuat gaya gravitasi garis lurus yang menarik musuh.

column2: Link enemies to cause them to share the damage they take.
column3: 적들을 서로 연결해 동시에 공격당하도록 합니다.
column4: Menghubungkan musuh, sehingga mereka akan berbagi damage yang diterima.

column2: Gather linked enemies to one area and make them collide with each other.
column3: 링크를 조여 연결된 적들을 한 점으로 모아 서로 부딪치게 해 공격합니다.
column4: Mengumpulkan musuh yang terhubung pada satu tempat dan membuat mereka bertabrakan satu sama lain.

column2: Link party members to share buff effects with each other.
column3: 파티원에게 링크를 걸어 버프 효과를 공유합니다.
column4: Menghubungkan dengan anggota party untuk berbagi Buff.

column2: Use the higher ability beween you and linked ally.
column3: 연결된 동료와 자신의 능력치 중 높은 능력치를 서로 공유합니다.
column4: Menggunakan kemampuan yang lebih tinggi diantara kamu dan anggota yang terhubung.

column2: Enlarge the size of you and your party member's hand to increase attack.
column3: 자신과 파티원의 무기든 손을 일시적으로 크게하여 공격력을 상승시킵니다.
column4: Memperbesar ukuran tangan kamu dan anggota party untuk meningkatkan damage.

column2: Shrink the size of your target. When used on small-sized enemies, there is a chance for them to disappear.
column3: 대상의 몸 크기를 작게 줄여버립니다. 소형의 적에게 사용시 확률적으로 사라져 버릴 수 있습니다.
column4: Mengecilkan ukuran target. Target memiliki kemungkinan menghilang bila digunakan pada monster berukuran kecil

column2: Enlarge the size of your target. When used on overly large enemies, there is a chance to cause an explosion.
column3: 대상의 몸 크기를 크게 키워버립니다. 크기를 지나치게 키워버린 적은 확률적으로 터져 버릴 수 있습니다.
column4: Memperbesar ukuran target. Target memiliki kemungkinan meledak bila digunakan pada monster yang terlalu besar

column3: 자신의 지능과 체력을 일시적으로 서로 바꿉니다.
적이 소환한 마법진의 주인을 자신으로 변경합니다.

column2: Enlarge the size of your and party members' hand holding shield and sub weapon to increase defense.
column3: 자신과 파티원의 방패 및 보조 무기를 든 손을 일시적으로 크게 하여 방어력을 상승시킵니다.
column4: Memperbesar ukuran tangan kamu dan anggota party yang memegang perisai dan sub weapon untuk meningkatkan pertahanan

column2: Enlarge the size of you and your party members' heads to increase INT.
column3: 자신과 파티원의 머리를 크게하여 일시적으로 지능을 상승시킵니다.
column4: Memperbesar ukuran kepala kamu dan anggota party untuk meningkatkan INT

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Lightning]{/}{/}{nl}Release a surge of electricity to attack enemies in front of you.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [전기]{/}{/}{nl}전기 사슬을 발사하여 전방의 적들을 연속으로 공격합니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Electric]{/}{/}{nl}Melepaskan gelombang listrik terus menerus untuk menyerang musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Drop chunks of ice to continuously inflict damage on enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [얼음]{/}{/}{nl}지정한 위치에 얼음 덩어리를 무수히 떨어뜨려 적에게 지속적으로 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Menjatuhkan potongan es dan menimbulkan demage ke musuh terus-menerus.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Summons Prominence. The summoned Prominence goes back and forth randomly, inflicting damage to targets.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [불]{/}{/}{nl}홍염을 소환합니다. 소환된 홍염은 임의의 위치를 오가며 대상에게 피해를 입힙니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Summon Prominence. Prominence akan bergerak secara acak dan menimbulkan damage pada target.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Drop meteors on the targeted area to inflict damage to an enemy.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [불]{/}{/}{nl}지정한 위치에 운석을 떨어뜨려 적에게 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Jatuhkan meteor pada target area untuk menimbulkan damage.

column2: Summon the devil of card inserted in Grimore. Grimore can only equip Devil type monster card.
column3: 그리모어에 삽입한 카드의 악마를 소환합니다. 그리모어에는 악마형 몬스터 카드만 장착할 수 있습니다.
column4: Summon the devil of card dimasukkan di Grimore. Grimore hanya dapat menggunakan Devil jenis monster card.

column2: Order the summoned devil from the Grimoire to move and attack in a targeted area.
column3: 소환된 악마에게 지정한 위치로의 이동과 공격을 명령합니다.
column4: Memerintahkan Devil Summon dari Grimoire untuk bergerak dan menyerang pada area target.

column2: Take control of the summoned devil from the Grimoire by riding it on top of its head.
column3: 그리모어로 소환한 악마의 머리 위에 올라타 악마를 직접 조작합니다.

column2: Mutates the summoned devil from the Grimoire to the devil that is equipped as a secondary card in the Grimoire while maintaining its previous stats.
column3: 그리모어로 소환한 악마의 능력치를 유지한 채로 그리모어에 장착된 서브 카드의 악마로 변이시킵니다.
column4: Memindahkan Summon Demon dari Grimoire yang telah dilengkapi dari Slot Card cadangan di Grimoire dengan tetap mempertahankan status sebelumnya.

column2: Order the summoned devil to wait and guard a targeted area.
column3: 소환한 악마를 지정한 위치에 대기하며 그 자리를 지킬 것을 명령합니다.
column4: Memerintahkan Demon Summon untuk menunggu dan menjaga area target

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Dark]{/}{/}{nl}Summon a familiar. The familiar rushes to an enemy that you attack or that attacks you, and then explodes itself.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [암흑]{/}{/}{nl}사역마를 소환합니다. 사역마는 주인이 공격하거나 공격받을 때의 적에게 돌진하여 자폭합니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Dark]{/}{/}{nl}Summon Familiar. Spirit Rush untuk musuh saat karakter menyerang atau diserang, kemudian meledak dengan sendirinya.

column2: Summon the fire devil Salamion. It follows its master and attacks enemies.
column3: 화염 악마 살라미온을 소환합니다. 살라미온은 주인을 따라다니며 보이는 적을 공격합니다.
column4: Summon Fire Demon Salamion. Mengikuti Master dan menyerang musuh

column2: Summon a servant. The servant will grant beneficial effects while following its master.
column3: 서번트를 소환합니다. 서번트는 주인을 따라다니며 이로운 효과를 부여합니다.
column4: Summon Servant. Servant akan mengikuti Masternya dan memberikan efek yang baik.

column2: Control time and temporarily increase attack speed of yourself or 1 ally in front.
column3: 시간을 조작하여 자신 또는 전방의 동료 1인의 공격 속도를 일시적으로 증가시킵니다.
column4: Kontrol waktu dan sementara tingkatkan attack speed dari diri sendiri atau 1 sekutu di depan

column2: Control time and make the monster appear again where it was killed.
column3: 시간을 조작하여 몬스터에게 죽은 뒤 그 장소에서 다시 나타나게 합니다.
column4: Kontrol waktu dan buat monster tersebut muncul lagi di mana ia terbunuh

column2: Stops time of monsters within the targeted area. Enemies do not receive damage when time is stopped.
column3: 지정한 위치 내 적들의 시간을 일시적으로 멈춥니다. 적들은 시간이 멈춘 동안 아무런 피해도 받지 않습니다.
column4: Hentikan waktu dari monster dalam area target. Musuh tidak menerima demage ketika waktu dihentikan

column2: Controls time to decrease the movement speed of enemies.
column3: 시간을 조작하여 적의 이동 속도를 감소시킵니다.
column4: Mengontrol waktu untuk menurunkan Movement Speed pada musuh.

column2: Control time and increase movement speed of yourself or 1 ally in front.
column3: 시간을 조작하여 자신 또는 전방의 동료 1인의 이동 속도를 증가시킵니다.
column4: Kontrol waktu dan tingkatkan kecepatan gerak diri sendiri atau 1 sekutu di depan

column2: Control time in an area, temporarily changing it back to its previous state.
column3: 자신 주변의 시간을 조작하여 순간적으로 이전의 상태로 되돌립니다.
column4: Mengontrol waktu disekitar area, sementara waktu mengubah kembali pada kondisi sebelumnya.
Attack Power #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Kumpulkan mayat dari setiap jenis

column2: Make Shogos molded after the card inserted in Necronomicon. Necronomicon can equip only Animal, Plant, and Mutant type cards.
column3: 네크로노미콘에 삽입한 카드의 형태를 본떠 쇼고스를 만듭니다. 네크로노미콘에는 동물형, 식물형, 변이형 몬스터 카드만 장착할 수 있습니다.
column4: Membuat Shogos dibentuk setelah kartu dimasukkan di Necronomicon. Necronomicon dapat melengkapi Animal, Plant, and Mutant type cards

column2: Use #{CaptionRatio}# each of {nl}Plant, Beast, Mutant corpse
{#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Throw corpse parts on a targeted area to attack nearby enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법]{/}{/}{nl}지정한 위치에 사체의 조각을 뿌려 인근 적들을 공격합니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Membuang bagian mayat ke target yang dituju dan menyerang musuh terdekat

column2: Attack #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Splash #{SkillSR}#{nl}Use #{CaptionRatio}# each of{nl}Plant, Beast. Mutant monster corpse
column4: Attack Power #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Splash #{SkillSR}#{nl}Use #{CaptionRatio}# setiap{nl}Plant, Beast. Mutant mayat monster

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Encircle yourself with corpse parts that will damage nearby enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법]{/}{/}{nl}자신 주변에 사체 조각을 둘러 접근한 적들에게 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Membuat lingkaran pada karakter dengan menggunakan potongan mayat dan menyerang musuh disekitarnya.

column2: Make a wall of corpse and block enemy attacks. Enemies attack nearby the wall becomes decomposed.
column3: 사체로 쌓은 벽을 세워 적의 접근을 막습니다. 이 벽 근처에서 공격당한 적들은 부패 상태가 될 수 있습니다.
column4: Membuat dinding mayat dan memblok serangan musuh. Musuh yang menyerang akan terkena damage.

column2: Dirty Wall Count: #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Dirty Wall Duration: 15 seconds{nl}{#339999}{ol}[Decompose]{/}{/} Duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds{nl}{nl}Consumes #{CaptionRatio2}# each of {nl}Plant, Beast, Mutant Corpses
column3: 더티월 #{CaptionRatio}#개{nl}더티월 지속시간 15초{nl}{#339999}{ol}[부패]{/}{/} 지속시간 #{CaptionTime}#초{nl}식물, 야수, 변이 사체{nl}각각 #{CaptionRatio2}#개 소비
column4: Dirty Wall #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Dirty Wall Durasi 15 detik{nl}{#339999}{ol}[Decompose]{/}{/} Durasi #{CaptionTime}# detik{nl}{nl}Gunakan #{CaptionRatio2}# setiap {nl}Plant, Beast, Mutant corpse

column2: Collect the corpse left over from where an enemy died.
column3: 적이 죽은 자리에 남아있던 사체 조각을 수집합니다.
column4: Mengumpulkan corps dari musuh yang telah mati.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Explodes an item of yours on the ground to damage nearby enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법]{/}{/}{nl}땅에 떨어져 있는 자신 소유의 아이템을 폭발시켜 주변 적에게 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Meledakkan item kamu di tanah untuk menyerang musuh

column2: Dig the ground and get ores for alchemy.
column3: 땅을 파 연금술에 필요한 광석을 획득합니다.
column4: Menggali tanah dan dapatkan ore untuk alchemy

column2: Opens a shop to roast and enhance gems. Reduces the penalty of an enhanced gem.
column3: 젬을 가열하여 강화하는 상점을 개설합니다. 강화된 젬은 페널티가 감소합니다.
column4: Membuka sebuah toko untuk meramu dan meningkatkan nilai Gems. Mengurangi denda pada saat Enhance Gem.

column2: Combine two items to change abilities of an item. The combined item will have its Potential reduced and the abilities may become better or worse.
column3: 두 개의 무기 아이템을 합쳐 아이템의 성능을 변경시킵니다. 합성된 무기는 포텐셜이 감소하며, 아이템은 성능이 올라갈 수도 내려갈 수도 있습니다.
column4: Menggabungkan dua item untuk mengubah item abilities. Item kehilangan potensi dan ability dapat menjadi lebih baik atau lebih buruk.

column2: Extract fluid from herbs to create different potions.
column3: 허브에서 액체를 추출하여 여러가지 포션 아이템을 만들어 냅니다.
column4: Ekstrak cairan dari ramuan untuk membuat ramuan yang berbeda.

column2: Use pluvial of alchemy to create a new item.
column3: 연금술의 비의를 사용하여, 새로운 아이템을 창조해냅니다.
column4: Menggunakan Pluvial of Alchemy untuk membuat sebuah item baru.

column2: Battle in another dimension to awaken an item's Potential. You can use the item's hidden option when you win the battle, but its Potential will be reduced.
column3: 아이템의 잠재된 성능을 끌어내기 위한 이계의 전투를 시작합니다. 이 전투를 성공하면 아이템의 숨은 옵션을 사용할 수 있고, 대신 아이템의 포텐셜이 감소합니다.
column4: Bertempur di dimensi lain untuk awaken Potential dari Item. Kamu mendapatkan hidden option dari Item setelah kamu memenangkan pertarungan, namun Potential akan berkurang.

column2: Each weapon has a different dungeon{nl}and Potential effects{nl}Maximum Level: 1
column3: 무기마다 각각 다른 던전과{nl}잠재효과가 있음{nl}1레벨 마스터
column4: Setiap senjata memiliki dungeon yang berbeda{nl}dan efek potensial{nl}Level 1 Master

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a shot that penetrates enemies. Enemies close to one another may be skewered together.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기]{/}{/}{nl}활 시위를 쭉 당겨 적을 관통하는 화살을 발사합니다. 주변에 다른 적이 있을 시 서로 꿰임 상태가 될 수 있습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Menarik bow dengan kuat dan menembakkan arrow lurus ke musuh. Target dapat terkena status Skewed bila ada musuh lain disekitar.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Kneel down to improve your concentration. Increases your attack and range.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기]{/}{/}{nl}집중력을 높이기 위해 앉아서 공격합니다. 공격력과 사거리가 증가합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Berlutut untuk meningkatkan focus. Attack Power dan range bertambah.

column2: Temporarily increases your movement speed while attacking.
column4: Attack dan movement speed bertambah sementara.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a shot that ricochets to a nearby enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기]{/}{/}{nl}공격시 근처 한 명의 적에게 화살이 튕겨져 나갑니다.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Demonstrate your strength by firing a shot that pushes enemies away.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기]{/}{/}{nl}시위를 강하게 당겨서 발사하며, 맞은 대상은 뒤로 밀려납니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Tarik busur dengan kuat untuk menembak dan target terdorong jauh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Penetrate straight through the enemy by aiming with the tip of your arrow.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기]{/}{/}{nl}화살 끝으로 표적을 겨냥해 일직선 상의 적을 관통시킵니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Gunakan ujung panah untuk membidik target dan tembus langsung.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Shoot an arrow with a high critical chance.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Menembak panah dengan tingginya tingkat dari critical.

column2: Attack speed decrease and ATK increase.
column3: 공격 속도가 감소하는 대신, 자신의 공격력이 증가합니다.
