column4: [Steed Charge] tidak lagi menjatuhkan musuh. (Hanya diterapkan bila attribute diaktifkan)

column2: [Doom Spike] no longer knocks enemies down. (Only applies if this attribute is set to ON)
column3: 스킬 [둠 스파이크]가 더 이상 적을 넘어뜨리지 않습니다. (해당 특성이 ON이면 무조건 넘어뜨리지 않습니다.)
column4: [Doom Spike] tidak lagi menjatuhkan musuh. (Hanya diterapkan bila attribute diaktifkan)

column2: Increases magic damage by 10% per attribute level when [Quick Cast] is active.
column3: 스킬 [퀵캐스트]가 활성화되어 있는 동안 마법 피해가 특성 레벨당 10% 증가합니다
column4: Meningkatkan magic damage sebesar 10% per attribute level saat [Quick Cast] diaktifkan.

column2: Increases the Companion's movement speed of [Praise] by 5% per attribute level.
column3: 스킬 [프레이즈]로 컴패니언의 이동속도가 특성 레벨당 5% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan movement speed Companion dari [Praise] sebanyak 5% per attribute level.

column2: Enemies attacked with [Rush Dog] have a 10% chance per attribute level to be afflicted with [Stun] for 6 seconds.
column3: [러쉬독]으로 공격 당한 적은 특성 레벨당 10% 확률로 6초 동안 [스턴] 상태에 빠집니다.
column4: Musuh yang diserang dengan [Rush Dog] memiliki kesempatan 10% untuk terkena [Stun] selama 6 detik per attribute level.

column2: Deals damage equal to 50% of physical attack to enemies knocked into the air by [Smite], on landing. (This effect only activates when the attribute is ON)
column3: 스킬 [스마이트]에 공격 당한 적은 공중에 솟구치며, 떨어지면서 물리 공격력의 50%만큼 대미지를 입습니다. (해당 특성이 ON일때만 효과가 발동합니다.)
column4: Memberikan damage dari 50% per the physical damage saat menjatuhkan musuh di udara, jika diserang dengan [Smite] skill. (Hanya diterapkan bila attribute diaktifkan)

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Attack an enemy by throwing your shield. Your shield drops on the targeted area, and your physical defense decreases based on the value of the equipment. The shield may be picked up or it'll automatically return to your inventory after a certain time. The decreased physical defense will return back to normal once your shield is back in the inventory.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}방패를 던져 적을 공격합니다. 던진 방패는 지정 위치에 떨어지고, 자신의 물리 방어력이 장비의 수치만큼 감소됩니다. 방패는 가서 줍거나 일정 시간 이후 자동으로 습득되며, 이 때는 감소된 물리 방어력이 원래대로 돌아옵니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menyerang musuh dengan melemparkan shield kamu. Shield kamu akan jatuh di wilayah yang ditargetkan, dan physical defense kamu menurun berdasarkan value dari equip. Shield dapat diambil atau secara otomatis akan kembali ke inventory kamu dalam jangka waktu tertentu. Physical defense yang menurun akan kembali normal setelah shield kamu masuk kembali ke dalam inventory.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Heavily strike enemies using the spikes on your shield. Enemies struck by the skill may temporarily lose the effects from their armors.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}양손으로 잡은 방패의 돌기로 적을 강하게 가격해 공격합니다. 적은 일시적으로 방어구들의 효과를 잃어버릴 수 있습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Membenturkan musuh dengan kuat menggunakan bagian metal pada shield kamu. Musuh yang terkena skill akan kehilangan efek armor mereka untuk sementara waktu

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Slash the enemy sideways.{nl}Inflicts additional damage on enemies affected by [Bleeding].
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}{nl}적을 좌우로 크게 베어 공격합니다.{nl}출혈 상태의 적에게 추가대미지를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Menebas musuh secara menyamping.{nl}Memberikan additional damage pada musuh yang terkena [Bleeding].

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Charge towards an enemy and cut a cross on their body, afflicting [Bleeding].
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}{nl}적 방향으로 전진하면서 적의 중심을 십자 형태로 베어 출혈 상태를 일으킵니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Menyerang musuh dan menebas secara menyilang ke tubuh mereka, menyebabkan [Bleeding].

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Decreases the defense for medium, big enemies for a while by smaking down.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}{nl}치켜든 검을 몸의 중심 방향을 따라 수직으로 내리꽂는 공격으로 중형, 대형의 적의 방어력을 일시적으로 감소시킵니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Mengurangi defense untuk musuh ukuran medium, big untuk sementara saat smaking down.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Attack an enemy by throwing your spear. Your spear will stick into the ground where it was thrown, and your physical attack will be decreased based on the equipment's upgrade count until you pick it up. It automatically returns to you after a certain time.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기]{/}{/}{nl}창을 던져 적을 공격합니다. 던진 창은 지정 위치에 떨어지고, 자신의 물리 공격력이 장비의 수치만큼 감소됩니다. 창은 가서 줍거나 일정 시간 이후 자동으로 습득되며, 이 때는 감소된 물리 공격력이 원래대로 돌아옵니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Melemparkan spear untuk memberikan damage pada musuh. Spear akan menancap di tanah di tempat itu dilempar, dan physical attack kamu akan berkurang berdasarkan perhitungan upgrade equipment  sampai kamu mengambilnya. Akan kembali padamu secara otomatis setelah batas waktu.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Strike the enemy's head, causing it to become afflicted with [Stun].
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}적의 상단을 연속으로 공격해 적을 스턴 상태에 빠트립니다.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Create an earthshake to stop enemies from attacking. The enemy has a chance to become afflicted with [Stun].
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}{nl}땅을 뒤흔드는 공격으로 적들의 공격을 멈추게 합니다. 확률적으로 적은 스턴 상태에 빠질 수 있습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Membuat earthshake untuk menghentikan serangan musuh. Memungkinkan musuh terkena stun.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Use centrifugal force and continuously attack enemies by turning body. Make an additional damage to the enemy stunned.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}{nl}몸을 회전시켜 원심력을 이용해 적을 강하게 공격합니다. 스턴 상태의 적에게 추가 대미지를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan centrifugal force dan menyerang musuh terus menerus dengan memutar tubuh. Memberikan additional damage musuh yang terkena.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Use your shield and sword to successively attack enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}{nl}적에게 칼과 방패를 이용하여 연속 공격을 가합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan shield dan sword milikmu untuk menyerang musuh secara beruntun.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Interrupt an enemy's action by using your shield. The enemy is turned around, and cannot take any actions temporarily.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}방패로 적의 행동을 방해합니다. 공격당한 적은 뒤로 돌아서고 일시적으로 행동이 제한됩니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Mengganggu pergerakan musuh dengan shield milikmu. Musuh berbalik, dan tidak dapat bergerak untuk sementara.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Attack with your shield. The attacked enemy will have its stat points jumbled temporarily.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}{nl}방패를 이용하여 공격합니다. 공격당한 적은 일시적으로 스탯 능력치가 뒤섞입니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Phyiscal] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Menyerang dengan shield. Status point dari musuh yang diserang akan diacak untuk sementara.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Perform a high kick to subdue an enemy. Hit enemies will temporarily take additional Strike damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}높은 발차기로 적의 기선을 제압합니다. 이 공격에 맞은 적은 한동안 때리기 속성의 공격에 추가 대미지를 입습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Melakukan high kick pada musuh. Musuh akan menerima additional damage dari Strike attack untuk sementara.

column2: Attack: #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Attribute Damage: #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Maximum Duration: 10 seconds{nl}AoE Attack Ratio: 5{nl}Able to use while riding
column3: 공격력 #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}특성 공격력 #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}최대 지속시간 10초{nl}광역 공격 비율 5{nl}탑승 상태에서 사용 가능
column4: Attack Power #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Attribute Attack: #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl} Durasi Maksimum: 10 detik{nl}AoE Attack Ratio: 5{nl}Dapat digunakan saat berkendara.

column2: Increases attack equal to [Skill Level]×[Number of Weapon Stars]{nl}Attack Count: #{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}Duration: 1 hour
column4: Meningkatkan serangan setara dengan [Skill Level]×[Jumlah dari Weapon Stars]{nl}Perhitungan Serangan : #{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}durasi: 1 Jam

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}As you spin, attack an enemy repeatedly using a weapon in each hand. The enemy will be immobilized temporarily.
{#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Use a weapon in each hand to deal successive strikes on an enemy.
{#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Inflicts damage on a frozen enemy in front of you. There is a small chance to remove freeze from the enemy when it takes damage.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [얼음]{/}{/}{nl}전방의 결빙 상태의 적을 충격하여 피해를 줍니다. 피해를 받은 적은 확률적으로 결빙이 해제됩니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Memberikan damage pada musuh yang beku didepanmu. Ada kesempatan kecil untuk menghilangkan efek freeze dari musuh saat terkena damage.

column2: Creates a curtain of ice for defense. Inflicts damage after successfully blocking an attack from an enemy. There is a certain chance to freeze nearby enemies.
column3: 순간 얼음의 장막을 만들어 방어를 시도합니다. 적의 공격을 성공적으로 방어하면 피해를 주고, 공격한 적 근처의 적들을 일정 확률로 결빙시킵니다.
column4: Menciptakan tirai dari es untuk bertahan. Memberikan damage setelah berhasil menahan serangan dari musuh. Ada kemungkinan tertentu untuk membekukan musuh disekitar.

column2: Creates a strong gust of wind that pushes enemies. When inflicting damage on a frozen enemy, it will unfreeze.
column3: 강풍을 일으켜 적들을 밀쳐냅니다. 결빙된 적에게 사용하면 피해를 주면서, 결빙을 해제시킵니다.
column4: Menciptakan hembusan angin yang kencang untuk mendorong musuh. Saat memberikan damage pada musuh yang beku, itu akan mencairkannya.

column2: Tighten the link to gather up the linked enemies in front of you.
column3: 링크를 조여 연결된 적들을 시전자 앞 한 지점으로 모아 버립니다.
column4: Mengencangkan link untuk mengumpulkan musuh yang terhubung didepan kamu.

column2: Temporarily increases the attack speed of you and your party members by manipulating time.
column3: 시간을 조작하여 자신과 파티원의 공격 속도를 일시적으로 증가시킵니다.
column4: Meningkatkan Attack Speed karakter dan anggota partymu dengan memanipulasikan waktu.

column2: Temporarily increases the movement speed of you and your party members by manipulating time.
column3: 시간을 조작하여 자신과 파티원의 이동 속도를 증가시킵니다.
column4: Meningkatkan Movement Speed karakter dan anggota partymu dengan memanipulasikan waktu.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Attacks the enemy with a spiraling arrow that penetrates and inflicts multiple strikes.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기]{/}{/}{nl}나선의 화살로 적을 공격합니다. 화살은 적을 파고들면서 여러 번의 타격을 입힙니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Menyerang musuh dengan panah yang berputar menembus dan memberikan multiple strikes.

column2: Applies a poison once to the weapon of you and your party members for the next attack.
column3: 자신과 파티원의 무기에 새의 맹독을 발라 다음 공격 1회에 적용시킵니다.
column4: Mengoleskan racun pada senjatamu dan party membermu sekali untuk serangan berikutnya.

column2: Duration: 30 seconds{nl}Zhendu Duration: #{CaptionRatio}# seconds{nl}Consumes #{SpendPoison}# Poison Pot Poison
column3: 유지시간 30초{nl}짐 독 지속시간 #{CaptionRatio}#초{nl}포이즌 팟 독 #{SpendPoison}# 소비
column4: Durasi: 30 detik{nl}Durasi Zhendu: #{CaptionRatio}# detik{nl}Memakai #{SpendPoison}# Poison Pot

column2: Maximum Magic Circles: #{SkillFactor}#{nl}Increases DEX for allies{nl}Enemy's Evasion & Defense: -#{CaptionRatio}#{nl} Duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds
column3: 마법진 #{SkillFactor}#개 생성{nl}아군 민첩 스탯 증가{nl}적 회피, 방어력 #{CaptionRatio}#감소{nl}지속시간 #{CaptionTime}#초
column4: Maximum Magic Circles: #{SkillFactor}#{nl}Increases DEX for allies{nl}Enemy Evasion & Defense: -#{CaptionRatio}#{nl} Duration: #{CaptionTime}# detik

column2: Plant a glyph on the ground symbolizing Baron Samedi, the loa of death. Increases the maximum HP and movement speed of you and your zombies nearby the glyph. Only half of the effect applies to you.
column3: 죽음의 르와인 삼디를 상징하는 문양을 지면에 설치합니다. 이 문양 주변 자신과 좀비들의 이동속도와 최대 HP가 증가합니다. 자신은 절반의 효과만 적용받습니다.
column4: Menanam Samedi glyph pada tanah untuk menlambangkan Death Noir. Meningkatkan maximum HP dan movement speed karaktermu dan zombiemu didekat glyph. Hanya setengah dari efek yang diterapkan padamu.

column2: You will set the pattern which represent Ogu which is the Rwa of Power on the ground. STR of the zombies nearby this pattern will be increased.
column3: 힘의 르와인 오구를 상징하는 문양을 지면에 설치합니다. 이 문양 주변 좀비들의 힘 능력치가 증가합니다.
column4: Kamu membuat pattern yang mewakili Ogu yang merupakan Rwa of Power ditanah. STR dari zombie didekat pattern akan meningkat.

column2: Attack: #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Attribute Damage: #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Up to 5 users{nl}Maximum Duration: 10 seconds
column4: Attack Power #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Attribute Attack: #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Sampai dengan 5 user{nl}Durasi Maksimum: 10 detik

column2: Push enemies away and create a barrier of protection which doesn't allow others to enter for some time. Increases the magic defense of allies who are inside the barrier.
column3: 주변의 적들을 바깥으로 밀어내고 한동안 들어올 수 없게 하는 방호의 벽을 세웁니다. 벽 안쪽 아군의 마법 방어력을 향상시킵니다.
column4: Mendorong musuh keluar dan menciptakan Wall of Protection yang tidak memperbolehkan yang lain masuk untuk beberapa lama. Itu akan meningkatkan DEF dari ally didalam wall.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Attacks an enemy as an attack for the betrayer. Resistance to Fire, Ice, Lightning, Poison of the enemy that received the attack will decrease.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}배교자에게 내리는 심판으로 적을 공격합니다. 공격당한 적은 불, 얼음, 전기, 땅, 독 속성의 저항력이 감소합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menyerang musuh sebagai serangan untuk pengkhianat. Resistance untuk Fire, Ice, Electricity, Poison dari musuh setelah menerima serangan tersebut akan berkurang.

column2: Attack: #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Attribute Damage: #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}AoE Attack Ratio: #{SkillSR}#{nl}All Properties Resistance: -#{CaptionRatio2}#
column4: Attack Power #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl} Property Attack #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}masing-masing Attribute Resistance #{CaptionRatio2}# berkurang

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use your trained fingertips to attack an enemy by inflicting an internal injury.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}{nl}단련된 손 끝으로 적의 내부를 강하게 공격하여 내상을 입힙니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menyerang dengan jari yang terlatih dan memberikan internal damage pada musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Gather force then shoot forward. The enemy is pushed away and will receive damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리]{/}{/}{nl}기를 모은 뒤 전방을 향해 발사합니다. 맞은 적은 뒤로 밀려나며 피해를 받습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Mengumpulkan tenaga lalu menempak kedepan. Musuh akan terdorong dan menerima damage.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Grass near the targeted area attacks an enemy. It casts in the place of [Chortasmata] first if it exists, otherwise it casts on you.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법]{/}{/}{nl}길게 피어 있는 풀들이 적을 공격합니다. 코르타스마타가 있는 위치에 우선적으로 시전되며, 없을 시에는 자신의 위치에 시전됩니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Rumput didekat area yang ditargetkan akan menyerang musuh. Cast di tempat Chortasmata terlebih dahulu jika ada, jika tidak ada maka Cast padamu.

column2: Grown grass protects you and your allies. It casts in the place of [Chortasmata] first if exists, otherwise it casts on you.
column3: 길게 피어 있는 풀들이 자신과 동료들을 보호합니다. 코르타스마타가 있는 위치에 우선적으로 시전되며, 없을 시에는 자신의 위치에 시전됩니다.
column4: Menumbuhkan rumput yang melindungimu dan anggota partymu.  Cast di tempat Chortasmata terlebih dahulu jika ada, jika tidak ada maka Cast padamu.

column2: Grass temporarily grows on the targeted area. Monsters within the targeted area become Plant-type monsters.
column3: 지정한 위치에 일시적으로 긴 풀이 자랍니다. 해당 지역에 들어온 몬스터는 일시적으로 식물형 몬스터로 판정합니다.
column4: Rumput tumbuh di area yang ditargetkan untuk sementara. Monster didalam target area menjadi monster type-Plant.

column2: Grants a temporary effect preventing Lv. 1 status ailments to nearby party members.
column3: 주변 파티원들에게 1레벨 상태이상을 막아내는 효과를 일시 동안 부여합니다.
column4: Memberikan efek sementara untuk mencegah efek berbahaya status Lv.1  pada party member terdekat.

column2: Increased movement speed and maximum HP.
column4: Meningkatkan Movement Speed dan maximum HP.

column2: In the state of Bwa Kayiman.
Applies one new deadly poison to your weapon for the next attack.
column3: 무기에 새의 맹독을 발라 다음 공격 1회에 적용시킵니다.
column4: Memberikan satu racun mematikan yang baru pada senjatamu untuk serangan selanjutnya.

column2: Able to equip [Cloth] armor. In addition, your maximum SP increases when you equip 3 or more pieces of [Cloth] armor. Your Magic Defense increases once you have 4 [Cloth] armor pieces equipped.
column3: [천] 계열 방어구를 착용할 수 있습니다. 또한 현재 착용한 [천] 계열 방어구 3개 이상 착용 시, 최대 SP가 증가합니다. [천] 계열 방어구 4개 착용 시, 추가로 마법 방어력이 증가합니다.
column4: Bisa menggunakan [Cloth] armor. Sebagai tambahan, maksimum SP-mu meningkat saat kamu menggunakan 3 atau lebih [Cloth] armor. Magic Defense karaktermu meningkat ketika kamu memilki 4 [Cloth] armor yang dipakai.

column2: Allows you to equip [Leather] armor.{nl}When equipped with 3 or more pieces of [Leather] armor, increases your Evasion.{nl} {nl}When equipped with 4 [Leather] armor pieces, your Evasion increases from attributes by an additional 50%.
column3: [가죽] 계열 방어구를 착용할 수 있습니다. [가죽] 계열 방어구 3개 이상 착용 시, 회피가 증가합니다. [가죽] 계열 방어구 4개 착용 시, 추가로 특성으로 상승하는 회피가 50% 증가합니다.
column4: Bisa menggunakan [Leather] armor.{nl}Ketika menggunakan 3 atau lebih [Leather] armor, meningkatkan Evasion karaktermu.{nl} {nl}Saat menggunakan 4 [Leather] armor, Evasion meningkat dari attribute dengan tambahan sebesar 50%.

column2: Able to equip [Plate] armor. In addition, your maximum HP increases when you equip 3 or more pieces of [Plate] armor. Your maximum Stamina increases once you have 4 [Plate] armor pieces equipped.
column3: [판금] 계열 방어구를 착용할 수 있습니다. [판금] 계열 방어구 3개 이상 착용 시, 최대 HP가 증가합니다. [판금] 계열 방어구 4개 착용 시, 추가로 최대 스태미나가 증가합니다.
column4: Bisa menggunakan  [Plate] armor. Sebagai tambahan, maksimum HP-mu meningkat saat kamu menggunakan 3 atau lebih [Plate] armor. Maksimum Stamina meningkat ketika kamu memiliki 4 [Plate] armor yang dipakai.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Umbo Thrust] by 1% per attribute level.

column4: Memberikan 20% additional damage per attribute level pada musuh yang terkena frozen dan petrified dengan [Targe Smash].

column4: Menyebarkan [Flame] setara dengan jumlah attribute level saat membunuh dalam [Flame] dengan [Targe Smash].

column4: Meningkatkan durasi dari efek Unbalanced status yang diberikan dari [Shield Push] selama 1 detik per attribute level.

column4: Meningkatkan 1% Damage dari [Dust Devil] yang dikenakan kepada musuh setiap level Property.

column4: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Hexen Dropper] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: Deals additional damage equal to 50% magic attack per attribute level when attacking an enemy under [Sleep] with [Energy Bolt].
column3: [슬리프]에 걸린 적에게 [에너지 볼트]로 공격 시 특성 레벨당 마법 공격력의 50%만큼 추가 대미지를 줍니다.
column4: Memberikan additional damage setara dengan 50% magic attack per attribute level saat menyerang musuh yang terkena [Sleep] dengan [Energy Bolt].

column2: Deals damage equal to 100% magic attack to enemies just when the link from [Unbind] is about to disconnect. Increases by 10% per attribute level from Lv. 2.
column3: 스킬 [언바인드]로 연결이 해제되기 직전, 적들에게 마법 공격력의 100% 만큼 대미지를 줍니다. 2레벨 부터 특성 레벨당 10%씩 증가합니다.
column4: Memberikan damage setara 100% magic attack pada musuh hanya ketika link dari [Unbind] dilepaskan. Meningkatkan sebesar 10% per attribute level dari Lv. 2.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Evocation] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [에보케이션]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Evocation] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: When equipped with a [Two-handed Bow], adds 20% additional damage of physical attack against airborne monsters.
column3: [양손활] 장착 시 공중형 몬스터에게 특성 레벨당 물리 공격력의 20% 추가 대미지를 줍니다.
column4: Saat menggunakan [Two-handed Bow], menambah 20% additional damage dari physical attack melawan monster udara.

column2: Increases your critical rate by 5% per attribute level when [Swift Step] is active.
column3: 스킬 [스위프트스텝]이 활성화 중일 때, 자신의 치명타 발생이 특성 레벨당 5% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan critical rate sebesar 5% per attribute level saat [Swift Step] diaktifkan.

column4: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Stake Stockades] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: Deals additional damage equal to 50% physical attack to the next used attacking skill during [Cloaking].
column3: 스킬 [클로킹] 중 다음 사용하는 공격 스킬이 물리 공격력의 50%만큼 추가 대미지를 줍니다.
column4: Memberikan additional damage setara dengan 50% physical attack pada skill serangan yang digunakan berikutnya selama [Cloaking].

column2: Increases the movement speed of [Cloaking] by 1 per attribute level.
column3: 스킬 [클로킹] 중에 이동속도가 특성 레벨당 1 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan movement speed dari [Cloaking] sebanyak 1 per attribute level.

column2: Increases the chance by 15% per attribute level of enemies turning around when using [Feint]
column3: [페인트] 사용시 적이 뒤돌아 볼 확률이 특성 레벨당 15% 증가합니다.
column4: [Paint] meningkatkan kesempatan musuh berbalik arah sebesar 15% per attribute level.

column2: Deals 10% additional damage to Plant-type monsters when equipped with a [Blunt] type weapon.
column3: [둔기] 착용 시 식물형 몬스터에게 특성 레벨당 10%의 추가 대미지를 줍니다.
column4: Memberikan 10% additional damage pada monster tipe-Plant saat menggunakan weapon tipe [Blunt].

column2: Increases the monster's physical attack converted with [Conversion] equal to 50% of the character's STR.
column3: 스킬 [개종]으로 개종된 몬스터의 물리 공격력이 캐릭터 힘 스탯의 50%만큼 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan physical attack monster yang dikonversi dengan [Conversion] setara dengan 50% dari STR karakter.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Conviction] by 1% per attribute level.

column4: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Conviction] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: Lv. 3 of Swell Left Arm: Enhance required
column4: Lv. 3 dari Swell Left Arm: Enhance diperlukan

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Raises your sword and smashes the area around the center of the body. Deals additional damage on medium and large-type enemies according to how much their defense has been decreased by Skull Swing.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}{nl}치켜든 검을 몸의 중심 방향을 따라 수직으로 내리꽂는 공격을 합니다. 스컬 스윙으로 방어력이 감소된 중형, 대형 적에게는 깎인 방어력 수치에 비례하여 추가 대미지를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Mengangkat padangmu dan menghantamkan di area sekitar badan. Memberikan additional damage pada musuh ukuran medium dan large sesuai dengan seberapa banyak defense mereka yang dikurangi dengan Skull Swing.

column3: 치명타 발생 #{CaptionRatio}# 증가{nl}블록 #{SkillFactor}#% 증가{nl}회피 #{CaptionRatio2}# 감소{nl} 지속시간 #{CaptionTime}#초

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Stab an enemy in front of you to make it more vulnerable to [Pierce] attacks.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기]{/}{/}{nl}전방의 적을 찔러 피해를 주고, 찌르기 공격에 취약한 상태로 만듭니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Menusuk musuh didepanmu, dan membuatnya rentan diserang dengan [Pierce] attack.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Release a strong attack on enemies by spinning your body. Increases your critical rate when the attack lands and deals additional damage to a stunned enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}{nl}몸을 회전시켜 원심력을 이용해 적을 강하게 공격합니다. 공격이 적중하면 치명타 발생이 증가하고, 스턴 상태의 적에게 추가 대미지를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Melepaskan serangan yang kuat pada musuh dengan memutarkan badanmu. Meningkatkan critical rate saat kamu mendaratkan serangan dan memberikan additional damage untuk membuat musuh terkena stun.
Attack Power #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Attribute Attack: #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}+50 Critical Rate{nl}AoE Attack Ratio: #{SkillSR}#

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}As you spin, attack an enemy repeatedly using a weapon in each hand. The enemy will be immobilized temporarily.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}{nl}회전하면서 양손에 든 무기로 적에게 연타 공격을 가합니다. 공격 당한 적은 일시적으로 행동이 제한됩니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Cut]{/}{/}{nl}Saat kamu berputar, menyerang musuh berulang kali menggunakan weapon di kedua tangan. Musuh tidak dapat bergerak untuk sementara.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Use a weapon in each hand to deal successive strikes on an enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기]{/}{/}{nl}양손에 든 무기를 이용해 적에게 연타 공격을 가합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan weapon di kedua tangan melakukan serangan beruntun kepada musuh.

column2: Creates a formation which brings squad members together. The skill cooldown time of the squad members that entered into the formation will be reduced in half. Duration will increase by Skill Level, and the number of members in the squad.
column3: 부대원을 소집하는 포메이션을 생성합니다. 포메이션에 들어온 부대원은 일정 시간동안 재사용 대기시간이 절반으로 적용됩니다. 지속시간은 스킬레벨, 구성원 숫자에 따라 증가됩니다.
column4: Membuat formasi yang membawa anggota squad bersama. Cooldown time skill dari anggota squad yang memasuki formasi akan dikurangi setengah. Durasi akan ditingkatkan berdasarkan Skill Level, dan jumlah anggota squad.

column2: Cooldown time reduced by 50%{nl}Minimum/Maximum Duration: #{CaptionRatio}# seconds ~ #{CaptionRatio2}# seconds
column4: Waktu Cooldown berkurang sebesar 50%{nl}Durasi minimum #{CaptionRatio}#Detik ~ Maks #{CaptionRatio2}#Detik

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Creates a magic circle of flames at a targeted area. Deals continuous flame damage to enemies within the magic circle.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [불]{/}{/}{nl}지정한 위치에 화염 마법진을 생성합니다. 적은 지속적으로 화염 피해를 입습니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Menciptakan magic circle dari api pada area yang ditargetkan. Memberikan flame damage pada musuh di magic circle terus menerus.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Creates a gravity field in front of you in a line that pulls nearby enemies into it.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법]{/}{/}{nl}일자 형태의 중력장을 생성하여 주변의 적들을 일렬로 끌어당겨 공격합니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Membuat gravity field didepanmu pada garis yang menarik musuh disekitar.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Damages an enemy by throwing an Ice Sphere.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Memberikan Damages pada musuh dengan melemparkan Ice Sphere.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Creates a magic circle of ice at a targeted area. Deals continuous ice damage to enemies in the magic circle.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [얼음]{/}{/}{nl}지정한 위치에 얼음 마법진을 생성합니다. 마법진내의 적은 지속적으로 얼음속성 피해를 받습니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Menciptakan magic circle dari es pada area yang ditargetkan.  Memberikan ice damage pada musuh di magic circle terus menerus.

column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}Summon Skeleton Soldier yang terbuat dari Corpse. Skeleton Soldier akan terlibat dalam pertempuran dan mengikuti masternya.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Deals damage to two nearby enemies with a bouncing arrow once an attack lands.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기]{/}{/}{nl}공격이 적중하면 근처 두 명의 적에게 화살이 튕겨져 나가 피해를 입힙니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Memberikan damage pada dua musuh terdekat dengan panah yang memantul saat mendaratkan serangan.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Creates a magic circle in front of you, healing allies or damaging enemies. Does not affect airborne enemies. Amount of HP recovered depends on the target's maximum HP.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [신성]{/}{/}{nl}HP를 회복하거나 적에게 피해를 주는 마법진을 생성합니다. 떠 있는 대상은 적용되지 않습니다. HP 회복량은 대상의 최대 HP에 비례합니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Menciptakan magic circle didepanmu, healing ally atau memberikan damage pada musuh. Tidak berpengaruh pada musuh di udara. Jumlah HP yang disembuhkan tergantung pada Maksimum HP Target.

column4: Summons holy torch, meningkatkan HP recovery ally terdekat. Menurunkan accuracy musuh disekitar.

column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [신성]{/}{/}{nl}성수를 뿌려 자신과 동료의 물리 방어력을 증가시키고, 적에게는 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Memercikan holy water untuk membantu meningkatkan physical defense karaktermu dan rekanmu serta untuk memberikan damage pada musuh.

column2: Temporarily increases the magic defense of you and your party members.
column3: 자신과 파티원들의 마법 방어력을 일시적으로 증가시킵니다.
column4: Meningkatkan magic defense karaktermu dan anggota partymu untuk sementara.

column3: 자신 주변의 모든 마법을 무효화 시킵니다.

column2: Decreased Fire, Ice, Lightning, Earth and Poison properties
column3: 불, 얼음, 전기, 땅, 독 속성 저항력 감소
column4: Fire, Ice, Electricity, Earth dan Poison Properties Berkurang

column2: Cooldown time of the skill will be reduced in half.
column4: Waktu Cooldown dari skill akan dikurangi setengah.

column2: The enemy is weak against Thrust type attacks.
column4: Musuh lemah melawan serangan tipe Thrust.

column2: Allows you to equip [Cloth] armor.{nl}When equipped with 3 or more pieces of [Cloth] armor, increases your maximum SP and magic damage taken is decreased by 5%.{nl} {nl}When equipped with 4 [Cloth] armor pieces, your Magic Defense increases and magic damage taken is decreased by an additional 10%.
column3: [천] 계열 방어구를 착용할 수 있습니다. 또한 현재 착용한 [천] 계열 방어구 3개 이상 착용 시, 최대 SP가 증가하며 받는 마법 피해가 5% 감소합니다. [천] 계열 방어구 4개 착용 시, 추가로 마법 방어력이 증가하며 받는 마법 피해가 10% 감소합니다.
column4: Memungkinkan kamu untuk menggunakan [Cloth] armor.{nl}Saat menggunakan 3 atau lebih [Cloth] armor, Meningkatkan maksimum SP karaktermu dan mengurangi magic damage diterima sebesar 5%.{nl} {nl}Saat menggunakan 4 [Cloth] armor, Magic Defense Karaktermu Meningkat dan mengurangi magic damage yang kamu terima dengan tambahan 10%.

column2: Allows you to equip [Plate] armor.{nl}When equipped with 3 or more pieces of [Plate] armor, increases your maximum HP and physical damage taken is decreased by 5%.{nl} {nl}When equipped with 4 [Plate] armor pieces, your maximum Stamina increases and physical damage taken is decreased by an additional 10%.
column3: [판금] 계열 방어구를 착용할 수 있습니다. [판금] 계열 방어구 3개 이상 착용 시, 최대 HP가 증가하며, 받는 물리 피해가 5% 감소합니다. [판금] 계열 방어구 4개 착용 시, 추가로 최대 스태미나가 증가하며 받는 물리 피해가 10% 감소합니다.
column4: Memungkinkan kamu untuk menggunakan [Plate] armor.{nl}Saat menggunakan 3 atau lebih [Plate] armor, Meningkatkan maksimum HP karaktermu dan mengurangi physical damage diterima sebesar 5%.{nl} {nl}Saat menggunakan 4 [Plate] armor, Maksimum Stamina karaktermu Meningkat dan physical damage yang diterima Berkurang dengan tambahan 10%.

column2: Deals 2.5% additional damage per attribute level when attacking an enemy from behind with a dagger.
column3: 적의 후방에서 단검 기본 공격 시 특성 레벨당 2.5%의 추가 대미지를 입힙니다.
column4: Saat kamu menyerang musuh dari belakang dengan dagger, itu akan memberikan 2.5% additional damage per attribute level.

column2: Allows you to equip the [Rapier] weapon type.
column4: Memungkinkan kamu untuk menggunakan weapon tipe [Rapier].

column2: Increases the maximum weight you can carry in your inventory by 20.
column4: Maksimum mass yang dapat dibawa meningkatkan sebanyak 20 inventory karakter.

column2: Companion's stamina consuming speed will be reduced.
column4: Memperlambat kecepatan pemakaian Stamina milik Companion.

column2: When the HP of your companion is less than 50%, it will activate the [First Aid] effect and continuously recover HP. [First Aid] cannot be used for another 10 minutes after it has been activated.
column3: 컴패니언의 HP가 50% 이하일 때, 잠시 동안 [응급치료] 효과를 받아 HP를 지속적으로 회복합니다. [응급치료] 이후에는 10분 동안 [응급치료 불가] 상태가 됩니다.
column4: Ketika HP dari companion dibawah 50%, menerima [Emergency Treatment] untuk memulihkan HP terus menerus. Setelah [Emergency Treatment], [Can't be treated] status.

column2: Increases provocation when enemies attack by 50% per attribute level.
column3: 적을 공격할 때 얻는 도발 수치가 특성 레벨당 50% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan provocation saat musuh menyerang sebesar 50% per attribute level.

column2: Increases your block by 5% per attribute level when equipped with a [Shield].
column3: [방패] 착용 시 블럭이 특성 레벨당 5% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan Block sebanyak 5% per attribute level saat menggunakan [Shield].

column2: [Skull Swing] does not push away enemies anymore. (Only applies if this attribute is set to ON)
column3: 스킬 [스컬 스윙]이 더 이상 적을 밀치지 않습니다. (해당 특성이 ON이면 무조건 밀려나지 않습니다.)
column4: [Skull Swing] tidak mendorong musuhmu lagi. (Saat attribute aktif, kamu tidak akan mendorong musuhmu lagi.)

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Spear Lunge] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [스피어 런지]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Spear Lunge] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases your block penetration by 10% per attribute level when equipped with a [Two-handed Spear]
column3: [양손창]으로 적 공격 시 블록 관통률이 특성 레벨당 10% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan block penetration kamu sebesar 10% per attribute level saat menggunakan [Two-handed Spear]

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Dust Devil] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [더스트 데블]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Dust Devil] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases your [Pierce] damage by 5% per attribute level when equipped with a [Rapier]. (Does not apply to basic attacks)
column3: [레이피어] 장착 시 [찌르기] 스킬의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 5% 증가합니다. (기본 공격은 해당되지 않습니다.)
column4: Meningkatkan [Pierce] damagemu sebanyak 5% per attribute level saat menggunakan [Rapier]. (Tidak berpengaruh pada Basic Attack)

column2: Increases the character's Fire property attack by 3 per attribute level when equipped with a [Staff].
column3: [스태프] 착용 시 캐릭터의 불 속성 공격력이 특성 레벨당 3 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan serangan fire property kamu sebanyak 3 per attribute level saat menggunakan [Staff].

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Flame Ground] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [플레임 그라운드]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh [Flame Ground] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: While equipped with a shield when [Subzero Shield] is active, there is an increase in counter attack damage based on your shield's defense. Counter attack damage is enhanced by 50% per attribute level.
column3: 방패 착용 상태에서 [서브제로쉴드]로 적의 공격을 막으면 방패 방어력에 비례하여 반격 대미지가 추가됩니다. 비례 수치는 특성 레벨당 50%로 적용됩니다.
column4: Ketika kamu block serangan musuh dengan [Sub-Zero Shield] saat menggunakan shield, akan ada counter attack damage yang lebih besar berdasarkan defense dari Shield. Counter attack damage akan menjadi 50% per attribute level.

column2: Increases magic defense and Ice property resistance equal to 25% of your equipped [Shield]'s defense per attribute level.
column3: [방패] 착용 시 방패 방어력의 비례하여 마법 방어력과 얼음 속성 저항력이 증가합니다. 비례 수치는 특성 레벨당 25%로 적용됩니다.
column4: Meningkatkan magic defense dan ice property resistance setara dengan 25% dari [Shield] defense yang kamu gunakan per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Frost Cloud] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [프로스트 클라우드]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh [Frost Cloud] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Freezing Sphere] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [프리징 스피어]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Freezing Sphere] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: Decreases the critical resistance of an enemy affected by [Slow] equal to 15% of your INT.
column3: 스킬 [슬로우]에 걸린 적의 치명타 저항이 캐릭터 지능의 15%만큼 감소합니다.
column4: Menurunkan critical resistance dari musuh yang terkena [Slow] setara dengan 15% dari INT kamu.

column2: Increases the attack of the summoned Shoggoth by 1 per attribute level.
column3: 소환된 쇼고스의 공격력이 특성 레벨당 1 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan serangan dari Shoggoth yang di summon sebanyak 1 per attribute level.

column2: Increases the attack of the summoned Corpse Tower by 1 per attribute level.
column3: 소환된 콥스타워의 공격력이 특성 레벨당 1 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan serangan dari Corpse Tower yang di summon sebanyak 1 per attribute level.

column2: Increases the attack of the summoned Skeleton Soldier by 1 per attribute level.
column3: 소환된 해골 병사들의 공격력이 특성 레벨당 1 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan serangan dari Skeleton Soldier yang di summon sebanyak 1 per attribute level.

column2: Increases the chance of enlarging the size and maximum HP of the summoned Shoggoth by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 스킬 [쇼고스 만들기] 사용 시 일정 확률로 크기와 최대 HP가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가된 쇼고스가 소환됩니다.
column4: Meningkatkan kesempatan memperbesar ukuran dan maksimum HP Shoggoth yang disummon sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: Creates an explosion using 200 silver when there are no nearby dropped items.
column3: 주변에 드랍된 아이템이 없을 때, 소지한 200 실버를 사용해 전방에 폭발을 일으킵니다.
column4: Menciptakan ledakan menggunakan 200 silver saat tidak ada drop item disekitar.

column2: Deals 20% additional damage per attribute level to Flying-type monsters when equipped with a [Two-handed Bow].
column3: [양손활] 착용 시 공중형 몬스터에게 특성 레벨당 20% 추가 대미지를 줍니다.
column4: Memberikan 20% additional damage per attribute level pada monster tipe Flying saat menggunakan [Two-handed Bow].

column2: Decreases the charging time of [Multi Shot] by half.
column4: Menurunkan charging time dari [Multi Shot] sebanyak setengahnya.

column2: Ignores the enemy's armor by 5% per attribute level when equipped with a [One-handed Bow]
column3: [한손활] 착용 시 적의 방어력을 특성 레벨당 5%만큼 무시합니다.
column4: Mengabaikan armor musuh sebesar 5% per attribute level saat menggunakan [One-handed Bow]

column2: Increases the critical chance of [Spiral Arrow] by 10% per attribute level.
column3: 스킬 [스파이럴 애로우]의 치명타 확률이 특성 레벨당 10% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan critical chance dari [Spiral Arrow] sebesar 10% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Spiral Arrow] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [스파이럴 애로우]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan damage yang diterima oleh musuh dengan [Spiral Arrow] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: Decreases the time of the first rotation by 0.3 seconds and increases the number of rotations for [Broom Trap] by 0.8 per attribute level.
column3: 스킬 [브룸트랩]의 1회전 소요시간이 특성 레벨당 0.3초 감소하고, 회전수가 특성 레벨당 0.8 증가합니다.
column4: Menurunkan waktu putaran pertama sebesar 0.3 detik dan meningkatkan jumlah putaran sebanyak 0.8 untuk [Broom Trap] per attribute level.

column2: Increases the movement speed of your companion from [Praise] by 1 per attribute level.
column3: 스킬 [프레이즈]로 컴패니언의 이동속도가 특성 레벨당 1 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan movement speed Companion dengan [Praise] sebanyak 1 per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Split Arrow] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [스플릿 애로우]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Split Arrow] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases your accuracy by 5% per attribute level when equipped with a gun.
column3: 총기류 장비로 적 공격 시 명중률이 특성 레벨당 5% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan accuracy kamu sebesar 5% per attribute level saat menggunakan equip type-Pistol.

column2: Deals 10% additional damage per attribute level to Mutant-type monsters when equipped with a [Revolver].
column3: [권총] 장착 시 변이형 몬스터에게 특성 레벨당 10% 추가 대미지를 줍니다.
column4: Memberikan 10% additional damage per attribute level pada monster tipe Mutant saat menggunakan [Revolver].

column2: Causes instant kill on small-type monsters by 0.5% chance per attribute level when equipped with a [Rifle].
column3: [장총] 장착 시 특성 레벨당 0.5% 확률로 소형 몬스터를 즉사시킵니다.
column4: Menyebabkan instant kill pada monster tipe small dengan kesempatan sebesar 0.5% attribute level saat menggunakan [Rifle].

column2: Deals damage equal to 100% magic attack to nearby Devil-type monsters when using [Divine Might].
column3: 스킬 [디바인 마이트] 사용시 근처 악마형 몬스터들에게 마법 공격력의 100%만큼 대미지를 줍니다.
column4: Memberikan damage setara dengan 100% magic attack kepada monster tipe Devil terdekar saat menggunakan [Divine Might].

column2: Increases the critical attack of [Zalciai] by 1 per attribute level.
column4: Meningkatkan critical attack dari [Zalciai] sebanyak 1 per attribute level.

column2: Enemies hit by [Hand Knife] have a 40% chance to be afflicted with [Armor Break] for 7 seconds. Increases the chance by 10% per attribute level from Lv2.
column3: 스킬 [관음장]에 피격 된 적은 40% 확률로 7초 동안 [아머브레이크] 상태에 빠집니다. 2레벨 부터 확률이 특성 레벨당 10%씩 증가합니다.
column4: Musuh yang diserang dengan [Hand Knife] memiliki kesempatan 40% untuk memberikan [Armor Break] selama 7 detik. Meningkatkan kemungkinan sebesar 10% per attribute level dari Lv. 2.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Lift your sword up and perform a vertical strike downward. Medium and large size enemies suffering a defense reduction from [Skull Swing] take additional damage proportional to the reduced amount of defense. The enemy also takes additional damage according to the number of debuffs in effect.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}{nl}치켜든 검을 몸의 중심 방향을 따라 수직으로 내리꽂는 공격을 합니다. 스컬 스윙으로 방어력이 감소된 중형, 대형 적에게는 깎인 방어력 수치에 비례하여 추가 대미지를 줍니다. 적에게 적용된 해로운 효과의 갯수에 따라 추가대미지 보너스가 적용됩니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Mengayunkan pedangmu dan melakukan serangan vertikal kebawah. Musuh ukuran medium dan large menerima defense reduction dari [Skull Swing] mendapat additional damage sesuai dengan jumlah defense yang dikurangi. Musuh juga menerima additional damage berdasarkan jumlah efek debuff.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}Stab an enemy in front of you.
{#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}Lower your stance and reach out to attack an enemy. Your evasion rate increases and the enemy becomes more vulnerable to [Slash] attacks.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기]{/}{/}자세를 낮추고 팔을 길게뻗어 적을 공격합니다. 자신의 회피율이 증가하고, 공격당한 적은 베기 공격에 취약한 상태가 됩니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}Menurunkan posisimu dan menggapai musuh untuk menyerang. Evasion rate kamu meningkat dan musuh menjadi lebih rentan terhadap [Slash] attack.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}Attack an enemy with the guard of your sword. The enemy's defense is ignored when attacked again with [Pierce] attacks.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [때리기]{/}{/}무기의 코퀼을 이용해 적을 공격합니다. 공격당한 적을 찌르기 속성으로 공격하면 방어력이 무시됩니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}Menyerang musuh dengan sarung pedangmu. Defense musuh diabaikan saat diserang lagi dengan [Pierce] attack.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}Move swiftly to avoid enemy attacks and deliver complex successive attacks.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [찌르기]{/}{/}신속하게 움직여 적의 공격을 회피한 직후에 전방을 향해 연속된 복합 공격을 가합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}Bergerak cepat untuk menghindari serangan musuh dan memberikan serangan beruntun yang kompleks.

column2: Twirl the tip of your sword to parry an enemy attack and prepare for the next attack. The next [Pierce] attack you make will inflict twice as much damage.
column3: 검의 끝을 회전시켜 적의 근접 공격을 막아내면서 동시에 다음의 공격을 준비합니다. 이 동작 후에 실행하는 찌르기 속성의 공격은 1회에 한정해 2배의 효과를 가집니다.
column4: Memutar ujung pedangmu untuk menangkis serangan musuh dan mempersiapkan serangan selanjutnya. Serangan [Pierce] yang selanjutnya akan memberikan damage dua kali lipat.

column2: Maximum Duration: #{CaptionRatio2}# seconds{nl}+#{CaptionRatio}#% block during skill duration{nl}Duration: 15 seconds
{#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}Perform a complex upward attack with your rapier. This attack protects you against an enemy attack.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [베기]{/}{/}레이피어를 사용해 아래에서 위로 올려치는 복합적인 공격을 가합니다. 이 공격에는 적의 공격에 대한 방어 기능을 포함하고 있습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}Melakukan serangan keatas yang kompleks dengan rapiermu. Meningkatkan block rate kamu untuk sementara.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Cast an arrow of ice that inflicts damage and has a chance of freezing the enemy.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [얼음]{/}{/}{nl}얼음의 화살을 날려 적에게 피해를 주고 일정 확률로 결빙 상태에 걸리게 합니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Melemparkan panah es yang memberikan damage dan memiliki kesempatan untuk membekukan musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Make ice spikes sprout out in a line to inflict damage. Has a chance of freezing enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[마법] - [얼음]{/}{/}}{nl}얼음 가시를 솟구치게 해 전방 일렬의 적들에게 피해를 주고 일정 확률로 결빙 상태에 걸리게 합니다.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Membuat Duri Es yang tumbuh pada garis, memberikan damage dan berkesempatan untuk membekukan musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Ride on an enormous snowball and crush any enemies in your way.
column4: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Menaiki bola salju yang besar dan menghancurkan musuh yang menghalangi jalanmu.

column2: Attack: 400% +#{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Attribute Damage: #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Casting Time: #{CaptionTime}# seconds{nl}AoE Attack Ratio: #{SkillSR}#
column4: Attack: 400% +#{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Attribute Attack: #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Waktu Casting: #{CaptionTime}# Detik{nl}AoE Attack Ratio: #{SkillSR}#

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Quickly fires a number of arrows at a targeted area.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Mengisi dan dengan cepat menembakan beberapa anak panah ke lokasi target.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Pull your bowstring back to fire a highly piercing shot. Enemies hit are pinned onto the surrounding terrain.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}활 시위를 쭉 당겨 적을 관통하는 화살을 발사합니다. 주변에 다른 적이 있을 시 서로 꿰임 상태가 될 수 있습니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menarik busurmu dan menembakan anak panah yang menembus musuh. Musuh yang saling berdekatan akan tertusuk bersama.

column2: Kneel down to improve your concentration. Increases your attack, attack speed and range.
column3: 집중력을 높이기 위해 앉아서 공격합니다. 공격력과 사정거리, 공격속도가 증가합니다.
column4: Berlutut untuk meningkatkan focus. Meningkatkan attack, range, dan attack speed.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires an arrow that bounces off of the target to hit an adjacent enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}공격시 근처 한 명의 적에게 화살이 튕겨져 나갑니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menembakan anak panah yang memantul ke musuh terdekat.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Demonstrate your strength by firing a shot that pushes enemies away.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}시위를 강하게 당겨서 발사하며, 맞은 대상은 뒤로 밀려납니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Tembakan kuat yang mendorong musuh hingga menjauh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires two shots at once at an enemy.
{#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires 5 arrows forward in an arc in front of you.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menembakan 5 anak panah kedepan secara menyebar dengan busur.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Aim with the tip of your arrow and penetrate through enemies in front of you.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}화살 끝으로 표적을 겨냥해 일직선 상의 적을 관통시킵니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menembus langsung menuju musuh dengan membidik  dengan ujung panahmu.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires an arrow with a high chance of critical at a target.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menembakan sebuah panah dengan Critical Rate yang tinggi.

column2: Increases the attack of [Missile] skills while decreasing the attack speed.
column3: 공격 속도가 감소하는 대신, [미사일] 스킬의 공격력이 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan attack dari skill sebagai ganti dari attack speed yang dikurangi.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires an arrow with a bomb attached. Upon hitting a target, the arrow will explode after an amount of time, dealing extra damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}폭탄이 매달린 화살을 발사합니다. 대상에 명중한 화살은 잠시 후 폭발하여 추가 피해를 입힙니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menembakan sebuah anak panah dengan bom. Panah akan meledak setelah beberapa lama dan menyebabkan damage tambahan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires an arrow that splits upon hitting a target to hit other adjacent enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}이 공격으로 대상을 공격하면 화살이 여러 개로 쪼개져 주변으로 튕겨 나갑니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Meluncurkan sebuah anak panah yang menyebar menjadi beberapa bagian dan memantul ke musuh disekitar.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a spiraling arrow that deals multiple hits to a target.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}나선의 화살로 적을 공격합니다. 화살은 적을 파고들면서 여러 번의 타격을 입힙니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menyerang dengan sebuah anak panah spiral yang menyebabkan beberapa serangan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Jump backwards while firing multiple arrows forward.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}시선 방향 뒤로 뛰면서 전방에 여러 발의 화살을 발사합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Berlari kebelakang dan menembakan beberapa anak panah kedepan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a stone bullet to push an enemy away. The target has a chance to become afflicted with [Stun].
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}돌 탄환을 발사하여 대상을 밀쳐냅니다. 대상은 일정 확률로 스턴 상태에 빠집니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl} Menembakan peluru batu yang membuat musuh terdorong kebelakang. Ada kesempatan untuk membuat target terkena stun.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Load multiple arrows into your crossbow and then fire them in quick succession at an enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}여러 개의 화살을 석궁에 장전한 뒤, 대상에게 연속으로 발사합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Mengisi crossbow dengan beberapa anak panah dan menembakannya kearah musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile] - [Poison]{/}{/}{nl}Blows a toxic arrow that inflicts damage over a long period of time.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일] - [독]{/}{/}{nl}입으로 부는 독화살을 발사하여 긴 시간 동안 지속적인 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile] - [Poison]{/}{/}{nl}Melepaskan panah beracun dan menyebabkan damage terus menerus.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile] - [Poison]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a contagious poison arrow. The poisoned target spreads poison around to nearby enemies whenever it is attacked.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일] - [독]{/}{/}{nl}전염성이 강한 독화살을 발사합니다. 중독 대상은 공격을 받을 때마다 주변으로 독을 전파합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile] - [Poison]{/}{/}{nl}Meluncurkan panah dengan racun yang menular. Racun akan menyebar melalui target setiap terkena serangan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a musical arrow to a target. Enemies nearby the target will be afflicted with [Fear].
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}소리를 내는 명적을 대상에게 발사합니다. 대상 주변의 다른 적들은 공포 상태에 빠집니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menembakan panah yang membuat kebisingan. Musuh disekitar akan terkena fear.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a flare on the ground at a targeted area. Upon hitting the ground, the flare bursts into sparks that damages nearby enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}지면에 섬광 화살을 발사합니다. 섬광이 터진 곳은 불꽃이 튀면서 주변에 있는 대상에게 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menembak panah kilat ke tanah. Kilat akan muncul dan menembakan percikan api ke musuh terdekat.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires an arrow that, upon hitting a target, bounces to hit two nearby enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}공격이 적중하면 근처 두 명의 적에게 화살이 튕겨져 나가 피해를 입힙니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Memberikan damage pada dua musuh terdekat menggunakan panah yang memantul ketika mendaratkan serangan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}If the target dies from this attack, it explodes. Party members gain STR for a period of time.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}이 공격으로 대상이 죽으면, 대상은 폭발하고 자신과 파티원의 힘이 일시적으로 증가합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Meningkatkan STR karaktermu dan anggota partymu untuk sementara ketika target mati dan meledak dari serangan ini.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a wide broadhead arrow. Inflicts [Bleeding] on the enemy hit.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}화살촉이 넓은 브로드헤드를 발사합니다. 이 화살에 맞은 적은 출혈 상태를 일으킵니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Meluncurkan Panah Broadhead yang lebar. Menyebabkan bleeding pada musuh yang terkena serangan ini.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a high-penetration bodkin arrow at an enemy. Lowers the defense of struck enemies and nullifies any protective magic.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}관통력이 강한 보드킨 화살을 발사합니다. 이 화살에 맞은 적은 일시적으로 방어력이 감소되며, 적을 보호하던 마법을 무효화합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Meluncurkan panah jarum yang menembus musuh kedalam. Saat hit, menurunkan defense musuh dan menghilangkan magic yang melindungi musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a barbed arrowhead. Deals a number of hits depending on an enemy's defense type.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}미늘촉을 발사합니다. 적의 방어타입에 따라 타격 수가 다르게 적용됩니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl} Meluncurkan panah berduri. Jumlah serangan tergantung pada jenis defense musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires an arrow that, upon hitting an enemy, creates a cross-shaped explosion.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}이 공격으로 적을 명중시키면, 십자로 폭발하는 화살을 발사합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl} Meluncurkan panah yang meledak pada musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires an arrow, igniting flames that inflict damage over time on enemies entering the targeted area.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}화살을 쏜 위치에서 불길이 올라와 대상에게 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Asap api dari area tembakan dengan panah dan menyerang musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires an arrow with explosives attached. Upon hitting its target, the arrow will explode after an amount of time and cause collateral damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}화살에 폭약을 매달아 발사합니다. 적에게 꽂힌 화살은 잠시후 폭발하여 주변에 피해를 줍니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Meluncurkan panah dengan peledak. Setelah mengenai target, panah akan meledak setelah beberapa lama dan menyebabkan damage tambahan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires multiple bullets in rapid succession at an enemy.
{#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Shoot forward while pushing yourself back with recoil.
{#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Maneuver quickly with your mount and attack enemies in front.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[미사일]{/}{/}{nl}탑승시의 기동력을 이용하여 빠르게 달리면서 적을 향해 공격합니다.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan kecepatan untuk bergerak dengan cepat saat menyerang ketika naik diatas.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Shoot repeatedly in the opposite direction you are moving.
column4: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menembak ke arah yang berlawanan saat kamu bergerak.

column2: Fires a shell to targeted enemies on the ground. Deals 50% damage on Flying-type enemies.
column3: 지면 상의 적들을 대상으로 포탄을 발사합니다. 공중형 적에게는 50%의 피해만 적용됩니다.
column4: Menembakan shell untuk musuh yang ditargetkan di tanah. Memberikan damage 50% pada musuh tipe Flying.

column2: Fires a shell to targeted airborne enemies. Deals 50% damage on enemies on the ground.
column3: 비행중인적을 대상으로 포탄을 발사합니다. 지면 위의 적에게는 50%의 피해만 적용됩니다.
column4: Menembakan shell untuk musuh yang ditargetkan di udara. Memberikan damage 50% pada musuh ditanah.

column2: Fire on the ground using a howitzer. Enemies hit by the fire will knock down and deals 5x damage to the enemy's structure.
column3: 지면을 대상으로 곡사포를 발사합니다. 피해를 입은 적들은 넉다운되며 적의 구조물에 대해서는 5배의 피해를 입힙니다.
column4: Menembak ke tanah menggunakan Howitzer. Musuh yang terkena tembakan akan terjatuh dan memberikan 5x damage pada bangunan musuh.

column2: Deals damage to multiple enemies by launching a cannon in an arc shape towards the ground.
column3: 부채꼴 범위의 캐논을 정면을 향해 발사해 다수의 적에게 피해를 입힙니다.
column4: Memberikan damage ke beberapa musuh dengan meluncurkan meriam berbentuk busur ke tanah.

column2: Maximum HP: +#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Movement Speed: +#{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}Duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds{nl}Glyph Duration: 15 seconds
column4: Maksimum HP: +#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Movement Speed: +#{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}Durasi: #{CaptionTime}# detik{nl}Durasi Glyph: 15 detik

column2: Carve a statue of Ausrine, the goddess of the Morning Star. Those in your party who circle around the Goddess Statue counter-clockwise are granted divine protection and become immune to damage temporarily.
column3: 새벽별의 여신 아우슈리네상을 조각합니다. 조각된 여신상을 반시계 방향으로 1바퀴 돈 자신 또는 동료는 일시적으로 대미지를 입지 않는 가호의 상태가 됩니다.
column4: Memahat patung Ausrine, Goddess of the Morning Star. Mereka yang berada didalam partymu yang berkumpul disekeliling patung berlawanan dengan arah jarum jam akan mendapatkan divine protection dan menjadi kebal terhadap damage untuk sementara.

column2: STR, CON, INT, SPR, DEX: -#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Consumes SP per second{nl}Maximum Duration: 10 seconds
column3: 힘, 체력, 지능, 정신, 민첩 #{CaptionRatio}# 감소{nl}1초당 SP #{CaptionRatio2}#% 소모{nl}최대 지속시간 10초
column4: STR, CON, INT, SPR, DEX: -#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Menghabiskan SP per detik{nl}Durasi Maksimum: 10 detik

column2: You and your party members are temporarily granted an increase in fire, ice, lightning, poison, and earth resistances, and have a chance of nullifying attacks from those properties.
column3: 자신과 파티원의 불, 얼음, 전기, 독, 땅 속성 저항력을 일시적으로 증가시키며, 해당 속성 공격 피해를 확률적으로 무효화 합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan fire, ice, lightning, poison, dan earth resistance Kamu serta Party Membermu You untuk sementara, dan memiliki kesempatan untuk menghilangkan serangan dari properti tersebut.

column3: 속성 저항력 #{CaptionRatio}# 증가{nl}속성 공격 무효 확률 #{CaptionRatio2}#%{nl}버프 지속시간 #{CaptionTime}#초

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Harness energy and release it in front of you, dealing damage and pushing back all enemies in its path.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[물리] - [신성]{/}{/}{nl}기를 모은 뒤 전방을 향해 발사합니다. 맞은 적은 뒤로 밀려나며 피해를 받습니다.
column4: Mengumpulkan energy dan menembakan ke depan. Musuh yang berada di depannya akan terkena damage dan terpental.

column2: Enemy's companion bites and holds. Decreased defense.
column3: 적의 컴패니언이 물고 늘어짐. 방어력 감소.
column4: Enemy's companion bites and holds. Decreased defense.

column2: Ignores defense by using Pierce-type attacks.
column3: 찌르기 속성으로 공격당하면 방어력이 무시되는 상태입니다.
column4: Mengabaikan defense dengan menggunakan serangan tipe Pierce

column2: Increased Pierce-type attack upon the next attack
column3: 다음 1회 공격하는 찌르기 속성의 공격력이 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan tipe serangan Pierce pada serangan berikutnya

column2: Increased chance of resisting Lv3 status ailments
column4: Meningkatkan persentase Resistance terhadap condition level 3 ke bawah

column2: Increased physical attack and magic attack
Increased physical defense and magic defense
Allows you to equip the [Rifle] weapon type.
column4: Memungkinkan kamu untuk menggunakan weapon jenis [Rifle].

column2: You can pay tax through the Master. A quick way to become a model citizen is by paying a lot and on time.
column3: 마스터를 통해 세금을 납부합니다. 꾸준한 세금 납부는 모범 시민이 되는 가장 빠른 방법입니다.
column4: Kamu bisa membayar pajak melalui Master. Sebuah cara cepat untuk menjadi warga negara teladan adalah dengan membayar banyak dan tepat waktu.

column2: Increases your physical defense by 10% per attribute level when [Guard] is active.
column3: [가드]가 활성화되어 있는 동안 캐릭터의 물리 방어력이 특성 레벨당 10% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan physical defense sebesar 10% per attribute level saat [Guard] diaktifkan.

column2: Increases block penetration by 10% per attribute level when attacking an enemy with a [Two-handed Spear].
column3: 적에게 [양손창]으로 공격 시 블록 관통률이 특성 레벨당 10% 증가합니다.
column4: Ketika menyerang musuh dengan [Two-handed Spear] meningkatkan 10% block piercing rate setiap property level.

column2: Inflicts [Bleeding] on an enemy attacked with [Keel Hauling] for 5 seconds. Increases the duration of [Bleeding] by 1 second per attribute level. Bleeding damage is proportional to the character's STR.
column3: 스킬 [킬 홀링]에 공격 당한 적은 5초 동안 [출혈] 상태에 빠집니다. [출혈]의 지속시간은 특성 레벨당 1초씩 증가하며, 출혈 대미지는 캐릭터의 힘에 비례합니다.
column4: Musuh yang terkena serangan Skill[Kill Holing] maka akan terkena kondisi[Bleeding] selama 5 detik. Durasi dari [Bleeding] meningkat 1 detik setiap level property, damage bleeding merupakan proporsi dari kekuatan karakter.

column2: Sequentially fling up to 3 enemies with [Iron Hook]. You cannot use [Keel Hauling] while capturing multiple enemies. (Unable to turn ON/OFF during [Guard])
column3: [아이언 후크]를 최대 3명의 적에게 순차적으로 던집니다. 여러명을 잡는 대신 [킬 홀링]을 사용할 수 없습니다. (아이언 후크를 사용 중에는 ON/OFF를 할 수 없습니다.)
column4: Melempar secara berurutan ke 3 musuh dengan [Iron Hook]. Kamu tidak dapat menggunakan [Keel Hauling] saat menangkap beberapa musuh. (Tidak dpat diubah ON/OFF selama [Guard])

column2: Nullifies an enemy's attack by a certain chance when [Jolly Roger] is active. Applies the chance by 0.5% per attribute level and increases the chance depending on the amount of pirate members. (However, it does not apply if nobody other than you is a pirate member)
column3: [졸리 로저] 효과 활성화 중 일정 확률로 적의 공격을 무효화 합니다. 확률은 특성 레벨당 0.5%씩 적용되지만, 해적단 단원수에 따라 확률이 증가합니다. (단, 해적단에 자신 이외에 아무도 없으면 적용되지 않습니다.)
column4: Membatalkan serangan musuh dengan kesempatan tertentu saat [Jolly Roger] aktif. Memberikan kesempatan sebesar 0.5% per attribute level dan meningkatkan kesempatan tergantung pada jumlah anggota pirate. (Namun tidak berlaku jika tidak ada pirate lain selain kamu)

column2: Increases your movement speed by 4 for 7 seconds per attribute level when opening a treasure chest.
column3: 보물 상자를 열면 특성 레벨당 7초 동안 캐릭터의 이동속도가 4 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan movement speed sebanyak 5 selama 7 detik per attribute level saat membuka treasure chest.

column2: Increases your [Pierce] damage by 3% per attribute level when equipped with a [Rapier] as a main weapon, but without [Shield] as a sub-weapon. (Does not apply to basic attacks)
column3: 주 장비로 [레이피어]를 착용하고, 보조 장비로 [방패]를 착용하지 않았을 시 캐릭터의 스킬 대미지가 특성 레벨당 3% 증가합니다. (기본 공격은 해당되지 않습니다.)
column4: Meningkatkan [Pierce] damage sebesar 3% per attribute level saat menggunakan [Rapier] sebagai main weapon, dan tidak menggunakan [Shield] sabagai sub-weapon. (Tidak berpengaruh untuk basic attack)

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Attaque Composee] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [아따끄 꽁뽀제]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Attaque Composee] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Lunge] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [런지]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Lunge] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Sept Etoiles] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [세테뚜와르]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Sept Etoiles] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Attaque Coquille] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [아따끄 꼬끼유]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Attaque Coquille] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Esquive Toucher] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [에스뀌브 뚜슈]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Esquive Toucher] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Flanconnade] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [플랑코나드]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Flanconnade] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Kunai] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [쿠나이]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan 1% Damage dari [Kunai] yang dikenakan kepada musuh setiap level Property.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Katon no Jutsu] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [인법 화둔술]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan 1% Damage dari [Katon no Jutsu] yang dikenakan kepada musuh setiap level Property.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Mijin no Jutsu] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [인법 미진술]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan 1% Damage dari [Mijin no Jutsu] yang dikenakan kepada musuh setiap level Property.

column2: Your character will hide for 5 seconds after using [Mijin no Jutsu]. Increases the duration from Lv2 by 1.5 seconds per attribute level.
column3: 스킬 [인법 미진술] 사용 후 캐릭터가 5초 동안 은신 상태가 됩니다. 2레벨 부터 지속시간이 특성 레벨당 1.5초씩 증가합니다.
column4: Setelah menggunakan skill [Mijin no Jutsu] karakter menjadi dalam kondisi hide selama 5 detik. Durasi meningkat 1.5 detik setiap property level mulai dari level 2.

column2: Your character will hide for 2 seconds per attribute level after using [Katon no Jutsu].
column3: 스킬 [인법 화둔술] 사용 후 캐릭터가 특성 레벨당 2초 동안 은신 상태가 됩니다.
column4: Setelah menggunakan skill [Katon no Jutsu] karakter setiap level property ,menjadi dalam kondisi hide selama 2 detik.

column2: Increases the cycle time for the STA cost by 0.5 seconds per attribute level.
column3: [분신술]이 활성화 중일 때 STA 소모되는 주기 시간이 특성 레벨당 0.05초 증가합니다.
column4: Ketika [Bunshin no Jutsu] sedang diaktifkan, maka STA yang terkonsumsi pada periode waktu, meningkat 0,05 detik setiap property level.

column2: Restricts movement of an enemy for 4 seconds when dealing damage with [Mokuton no Jutsu]. Increases the duration from Lv2 by 1 second per attribute level.
column3: 스킬 [인법 목둔술]에 피해를 입은 적은 4초 동안 이동 불가 상태가 됩니다. 2레벨 부터 지속시간이 특성 레벨당 1초씩 증가합니다.
column4: Musuh yang terkena damage dari [Mokuton no Jutsu] akan mengalami tidak bisa bergerak selama 4 detik. Durasi meningkat 1 detik setiap level property mulai dari level 2.

column2: Decreases the damage of the shadow clones of [Bunshin no Jutsu].
column4: Mengurangi besaran damage yang diterima oleh para Bunshin dari [Bunshin no Jutsu].

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Dragontooth] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [드래곤투스]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan 1% Damage dari [Dragon Tooth] yang dikenakan kepada musuh setiap level Property.

column2: Increases the character's evasion by 10% per attribute level for 7 seconds after using [Dragontooth].
column3: 스킬 [드래곤투스] 사용 후 7초 동안 캐릭터의 회피가 특성 레벨당 10% 증가합니다.
column4: Setelah menggunakan Skill [Dragon Tooth] maka meningkatkan 10% evasion dari Karakter selama 7 detik setiap property level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Serpentine] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [세펜틴]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan 1% Damage dari [Serpentine] yang dikenakan kepada musuh setiap level Property.

column2: Enemies hit by [Serpentine] have a 2% chance per attribute level to be afflicted with [Bleeding] for 8 seconds. Bleeding damage is proportional to the character's physical attack.
column3: 스킬 [세펜틴]에 피격된 적이 특성 레벨당 2% 확률로 8초 동안 [출혈]에 걸립니다. 출혈 대미지는 캐릭터의 물리 공격력에 비례합니다.
column4: Musuh yang terkena skill [Serpentine] akan terkena  [Bleeding] selama 8 detik dengan kesempatan 2% setiap property level. Damage Bleeding diakumulasikan dari Physical Attack Character.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Gae Bulg] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [게이불그]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan 1% Damage dari [Gae Bulga] yang dikenakan kepada musuh setiap level Property.

column2: Creates a defense zone for 15 seconds where the spear is thrown. Increases physical defense and magic defense by 2% for party members within the zone.
column3: 던져진 창 위치에 15초 동안 방어 지대가 펼쳐집니다. 방어 지대에 있는 동료는 방어력 증가 효과를 받아, 물리 방어력과 마법 방어력이 2% 증가합니다.
column4: Pada lokasi tombak dilemparkan, akan menyebar Defense area selama 15 detik. Kawan yang berada di Defense area akan mendapat Defense Increase, sehingga Physical Defense dan Magic Defense meningkat 2%.

column2: Creates an attack zone for 15 seconds where the spear is thrown. Increases physical attack and magic attack by 2% for party members within the zone.
column3: 던져진 창 위치에 15초 동안 공격 지대가 펼쳐집니다. 공격 지대에 있는 동료는 공격력 증가 효과를 받아, 물리 공격력과 마법 공격력이 2% 증가합니다.
column4: Pada lokasi tombak dilemparkan, akan menyebar Attack area selama 15 detik. Kawan yang berada di Attack area akan mendapat Attack Increase, sehingga Physical Attack dan Magic Attack meningkat 2%.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Dragon Soar] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [드래곤소어]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan 1% Damage dari [Dragon Soar] yang dikenakan kepada musuh setiap level Property.

column2: Enemies hit by [Dragon Soar] have a 5% chance per attribute level to be afflicted with [Shock] for 10 seconds.
column3: 스킬 [드래곤소어]에 피해입은 적은 특성 레벨당 5% 확률로 10초 동안 [충격] 상태에 빠집니다.
column4: Musuh yang terkena damage dari Skill [Dragon Soar] akan mengalami kondisi [Shock] selama 10 detik dengan persentase 5% setiap property level.

column2: Increases the chance to nullify an enemy's attack while using [Lifeline] by 2% per attribute level.
column3: [생명줄] 효과가 활성화 중일 때 적의 공격을 무효화할 확률이 특성 레벨당 2% 증가합니다.
column4: Ketika efek [Umbilical] sedang teraktifkan, maka persentase pembatalan serangan dari musuh meningkat 2% setiap property level.

column2: Deals 10% additional damage per attribute level of the Lightning property attack to enemies affected by [Joint Penalty].
column3: [조인트 페널티]에 걸린 적은 전기 속성 공격에 특성 레벨당 10% 추가 대미지를 입습니다.
column4: Musuh yang terkena [Joint Penalty] akan terkena ekstra damage 10% setiap property level pada serangan attribute electric.

column2: Deals 10% additional damage per attribute level of the Poison property attack to enemies affected by [Joint Penalty].
column3: [조인트 페널티]에 걸린 적은 독 속성 공격에 특성 레벨당 10% 추가 대미지를 입습니다.
column4: Musuh yang terkena [Joint Penalty] akan terkena ekstra damage 10% setiap property level pada serangan attribute poison.

column2: Deals 10% additional damage per attribute level of the Earth property attack to enemies affected by [Joint Penalty].
column3: [조인트 페널티]에 걸린 적은 대지 속성 공격에 특성 레벨당 10% 추가 대미지를 입습니다.
column4: Musuh yang terkena [Joint Penalty] akan terkena ekstra damage 10% setiap property level pada serangan attribute earth.

column2: Decreases the chance to nullify attacks from enemies affected by [Joint Penalty] by 5% per attribute level.
column3: [조인트 페널티]에 걸린 적들은 공격을 무효화할 확률이 특성 레벨당 5% 감소합니다.
column4: Para musuh yang terkena [Joint Penalty] berkurang 5% persentase agar serangan menjadi void setiap property level.

column2: The summoned servant grants beneficial effects more often.
column3: 서번트의 이로운 효과를 부여하는 속도가 빨라집니다.
column4: Servant memberikan benefit yang lebih banyak.

column2: Decreases the chance of nullifying an attack by 6% per attribute level when enemies are affected by [Slow].
column3: [슬로우]에 걸린 적이 공격 받을 때, 그 공격을 무효화 할 확률이 특성 레벨당 6% 감소합니다.
column4: Mengurangi kesempatan untuk membatalkan serangan sebesar 6% per attribute level saat musuh terkena [Slow].

column2: Increases your evasion by 20 per attribute level while [Haste] is active.
column3: [헤이스트] 활성화 중일 때, 자신의 회피가 특성 레벨당 20 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan evasion sebanyak 20 per attribute level ketika [Haste] diaktifkan.

column2: Decreases the SP cost of [Stop] by 40.
Increases the damage of a Dark property attack dealt on an enemy by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 어둠 속성 공격의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan 1% Damage dari serangan Darkness Attribute yang dikenakan kepada musuh setiap level Property.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Pole of Agony] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [폴 오브 아고니]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan 1% Damage dari [Full of Agony] yang dikenakan kepada musuh setiap level Property.

column2: Increases the remaining effect time of [Pole of Agony] on an enemy by 0.8 seconds per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 남아있는 [폴 오브 아고니] 효과 시간이 특성 레벨당 0.8초 증가합니다
column4: Waktu efek [Full of Agony] yang tersisa pada musuh, meningkat 0.8 detik setiap property level

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Invocation] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [인보케이션]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan 1% Damage dari [Invocation] yang dikenakan kepada musuh setiap level Property.

column2: Increases the Dark property attack by 5% per attribute level of allies who are nearby the created evil spirit of [Invocation]. The owner of who casted the evil spirit receives double the effect.
column3: [인보케이션]으로 생성된 악령 근처에 있는 동료들은 어둠 속성 공격력이 특성 레벨당 5% 증가합니다. 악령의 주인인 시전자는 2배의 효과를 받습니다.
column4: Kawan yang berada di sekitar evil spirit yang tercipta oleh [Invocation] akan meningkat attack darkness attribute sebanyak 5% setiap property level. Caster dari evil spirit mendapatkan efek 2 kali lipat.

column2: Creates an evil spirit with [Dark Theurge] at a 0.4% chance per attribute level to the enemy's position.
column3: [다크 써지]에 피격된 적 위치에 특성 레벨당 0.4% 확률로 악령을 생성합니다.
column4: pada lokasi musuh terkena [Dark Theurge] tercipta evil spirit dengan persentase 0.4% per property level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Dark Theurge] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [다크 써지]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan 1% Damage dari [Dark Theurge] yang dikenakan kepada musuh setiap level Property.

column2: Enemies hit by [Dark Theurge] have a 1% chance per attribute level to be afflicted with [Blind] for 10 seconds.
column3: 스킬 [다크 써지]에 피격되는 적이 특성 레벨당 1% 확률로 10초 동안 [암흑] 상태에 걸립니다.
column4: Musuh yang terkena skill  [Dark Theurge] akan mengalami kondisi [Darkness] selama 10 detik dengan persentase 1% setiap property level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Mastema] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 적에게 입히는 [마스테마]의 대미지가 특성 레벨당 1% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan 1% Damage dari [Mastema] yang dikenakan kepada musuh setiap level Property.

column2: Reduces the aggressiveness of enemies hit by [Mastema] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: 스킬 [마스테마]에 피해 입은 적의 도발 수치가 특성 레벨당 1% 감소합니다.
column4: nilai provoke dari monster yang terkena damage skill [Mastema] berkurang 1% setiap property level.

column2: [Pole of Agony] deals a minimum number of damage to enemies. The higher the attribute level, the higher the minimum number.
column3: 적에게 남아있는 [폴 오브 아고니] 효과의 대미지가 일정 수치 이하로 내려가지 않고 고정됩니다. 특성 레벨을 올릴수록 수치가 증가합니다.
column4: Angka damage menjadi permanen dan tidak turun ke bawah angka yang ditetapkan dari efek [Full of Agony] yang tersisa pada musuh. Semakin meningkat property level maka angkanya meningkat.

column2: Increases the amount to absorb HP by 1 per attribute level.
column4: Jumlah HP yang diserap melalui [Blood Sucking] meningkat 1 setiap property level.

column2: Increases the amount to absorb SP by 1 per attribute level.

column4: Musuh yang terkena skill [Kodaicha](atau dengan cara lainnya) [Hexing] maka akan mendapat damage 2 kali lipat dengan persentase 1% setiap property level.

column2: Increases the chance to nullify the enemy's physical attack while using [Levitation] by 1.5% per attribute level.
column3: [레비테이션] 효과가 활성화 중일 때 적의 물리 공격을 무효화할 확률이 특성 레벨당 1.5% 증가합니다.
column4: Ketika efek [Levitation] sedang teraktifkan, maka persentase void serangan physical musuh meningkat 1.5% setiap property level.

column2: Increases the recovery of HP and SP from skills and potions by 0.5% per attribute level.
column3: 물약이나 스킬로 회복되는 HP와 SP가 특성 레벨당 0.5% 증가합니다.
column4: Dengan Potion atau Skill meningkatkan 0.5% HP dan SP yang regenerasi setiap property level.

column2: Deals 20% additional damage per attribute level when attacking Flying-type monsters with a [Two-handed Bow].
column3: 공중형 몬스터에게 [양손활]로 공격 시 특성 레벨당 20% 추가 대미지를 줍니다.
column4: Ketika menyerang monster tipe Air dengan [Two Handed Bow] maka memberikan ekstra damage 20% setiap property level.

column2: Ignores 5% of an enemy's defense per attribute level when attacking with a [One-handed Bow].
column3: 적에게 [한손활]로 공격 시 적의 방어력을 특성 레벨당 5%만큼 무시합니다.
column4: Ketika menyerang musuh dengan [One Handed Bow] maka mengabaikan defense musuh sebesar 5% setiap property level.

column2: Increases the chance of blocking an enemy's [Missile] attack when equipped with a [Shield], increases your physical attack proportional to your shield's defense for 10 seconds after a successful block. Applies the proportional value by 50% per attribute level.
column3: [방패] 착용 시 적의 [미사일] 공격을 블록할 확률이 증가하고, 블록에 성공하면 10초 동안 방패 방어력의 비례하여 물리 공격력이 증가합니다. 비례 수치는 특성 레벨당 50%로 적용됩니다.
column4: Ketika mengenakan [Shield] mmaka persentase blokir serangan [Missile] dari musuh meningkat, Jika blok berhasil maka dengan akumulasi shield defense selama 10 detik, meningkatkan physical attack. Angka akumulasi diberlakukan 50% setiap property level.

column2: Player detoxified by [Detoxify] becomes immune to poison for 4 seconds per attribute level.
column3: 스킬 [해독]으로 [독]이 해제된 캐릭터는 특성 레벨당 4초 동안 [독]에 면역이 됩니다.
column4: Player yang disembuhkan dengan [Detoxify] menjadi kebal terhadap poison selama 4 detik per attribute level.

column2: Decreases the Poison Pot cost by 1% per attribute level when using a Wugushi skill.

column4: Menurunkan harga Poison Pot sebanyak 1% per attribute level saat menggunakan Wugushi skill.

column4: Menurunkan evasion rate musuh yang terkena [Jincan Gu] sebanyak 5% per attribute level.

column2: Decreases the poison resistance of enemies affected by [Zhendu] by 7 per attribute level.

column4: Meningkatkan 1% Damage dari [Bayonet Thrust] yang dikenakan kepada musuh setiap level Property.

column2: Enemies hit by [Butt Stroke] have a 1.5% chance per attribute level to become afflicted with [Stun] for 3 seconds.

column4: Ketika melakukan basic attack dengan [Dungi] kepada musuh, mengenakan stun dengan chance 2%.

column2: Increases the attack count of [Blessing] by 10 per attribute level.

column4: Mengurangi range dari [Caraver World Tree], namun meningkatkan durasinya selama 10 detik.

column2: Statue of Goddess Ausrine: Decreased Cooldown
Decreases the cooldown of [Statue of Goddess Ausrine] by 10 seconds.
column4: Mengurangi cooldown dari [Carve Goddess Ausrine] selama 10 detik.

column2: Decreases the enemy's physical defense by 30% with a chance of 10% per attribute level when using a basic attack during Out of Body. (Unable to turn ON/OFF during Out of Body.)
column3: 유체 상태에서의 기본 공격에 피격 된 적은 특성 레벨당 10% 확률로 물리 방어력이 30% 감소합니다. (유체 이탈 중에는 ON/OFF를 할 수 없습니다.)
column4: Mengurangi physical defense musuh sebesar 30% dengan kemungkinan sebesar 10% per attribute level ketika menggunakan basic attack selama Out of Body. (Tidak dapat mengubah ON / OFF selama  Out of Body.)

column2: Decreases the SP cost per second of [Vashita Siddhi] by 0.5% per attribute level.
column3: 스킬 [바쉬타 싯디]의 1초당 SP 소모량이 특성 레벨당 0.5% 감소합니다.
column4: Mengurangi penggunaan SP per detik dari [Vashita Siddhi] sebesar 0.5% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the chance of nullifying Fire, Ice, Lightning, Poison and Earth property attacks by 0.8% per attribute level when [Resist Elements] is active.
column3: 스킬 [레지스트 엘리멘탈]이 활성화 중일 때 불, 얼음, 전기, 독, 땅 속성 공격을 무효화할 확률이 특성 레벨당 0.8% 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan kesempatan untuk menghilangkan fire, ice, lightning, poison dan earth property attack sebesar 0.08% per attribute level saat [Resist Elements] diaktifkan.

column2: Increases the property resistance of [Resist Elements] by 1 per attribute level.
column3: 특성 레벨당 [레지스트 엘리멘츠] 속성 저항력들이 1 증가합니다.
column4: Meningkatkan property resistance dari [Resist Elements] sebanyak 1 per attribute level.

column2: Increases the duration of [Increase Magic Defense] by 1 second per attribute level.
